parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

questions.text_audio:
Who was hired to be the manager's new assistant?
A. Jacob got the job
B. OK, I'll give them a quick tour
C. At this afternoon's staff meeting

A. Jacob \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c công vi\u1ec7c<\/p>

B. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a h\u1ecd \u0111i tham quan nhanh<\/p>

C. T\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhân viên chi\u1ec1u nay<\/p>"}

questions.title: Listen and choose the best answer:

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Excuse me, sir, but I think you're in my seat, 14-A?

M-Au: Let me take a look at my ticket... hmm, no, it seems I'm in the right place. My ticket says 14-A as well.

W-Am: Well... this is train car five. Are you sure you're in the right car?

M-Au: Oh, pardon me! I'm 14-A in car six. I've put my bags on the overhead rack, so just give me a moment to get my things together.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin l\u1ed7i, th\u01b0a ông, nh\u01b0ng tôi ngh\u0129 ông \u0111ang ng\u1ed3i trên gh\u1ebf c\u1ee7a tôi, 14-A?
M-Au: \u0110\u1ec3 tôi xem qua vé c\u1ee7a tôi ... hmm, không ph\u1ea3i, có v\u1ebb tôi ng\u1ed3i \u0111úng ch\u1ed7 r\u1ed3i. Vé c\u1ee7a tôi c\u0169ng ghi 14-A.
W-Am: À ... \u0111ây là toa tàu n\u0103m. Ông có ch\u1eafc mình \u0111ang \u1edf \u0111úng toa không?
M-Au: \u1ed2, th\u1ee9 l\u1ed7i cho tôi! Tôi ng\u1ed3i gh\u1ebf 14-A \u1edf toa sáu. Tôi \u0111\u1ec3 túi trên giá treo trên cao, nên hãy cho tôi m\u1ed9t chút th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 gom \u0111\u1ed3 xu\u1ed1ng.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What are the speakers discussing?

childrens.explains:

Các ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói \u0111ang th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn \u0111i\u1ec1u gì?<\/p>

The man's in the wrong train car and he's in the woman's seat. <\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Mr. Lin, I'm calling from Central Dentistry. You have an appointment with Dr. Sumner on June eighth at two P.M. I was wondering if we'd be able to move your appointment to three o'clock.

M-Cn: Well, I have a sales call scheduled that morning, but I think three o'clock would be all right.

W-Br: Wonderful, we really appreciate it. Most of our staff will be attending a dental workshop earlier in the day, and they are concerned about getting back in time.

M-Cn: No problem at all. I'll mark down that change in my calendar right now.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào ông Lin, tôi \u0111ang g\u1ecdi t\u1eeb Nha khoa Central. Ông có h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi Bác s\u0129 Sumner vào ngày 8 tháng 6 lúc hai gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. Tôi t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi li\u1ec7u chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 d\u1eddi cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n c\u1ee7a ông sang ba gi\u1edd không.
M-Cn: À, tôi có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi bán hàng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1ebfp l\u1ecbch vào sáng hôm \u0111ó, nh\u01b0ng tôi ngh\u0129 ba gi\u1edd c\u0169ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c.
W-Br: Tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi, chúng tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 bi\u1ebft \u01a1n. H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft nhân viên c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o nha khoa vào hôm \u0111ó và h\u1ecd lo không tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c k\u1ecbp th\u1eddi.
M-Cn: Không có v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì c\u1ea3. Tôi s\u1ebd ghi l\u1ea1i thay \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111ó trong l\u1ecbch c\u1ee7a mình ngay bây gi\u1edd.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What most likely is the woman's job?

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Jackie, some of our hotel guests would like to see the symphony orchestra perform tomorrow night. I've called the box office a couple of times to book tickets for them, but I just get a recording.

W-Am: Well, I've got a brochure about another classical music performance happening tomorrow night at a different venue. Why don't you ask our guests if they'd be interested in seeing that show instead?

M-Cn: Great! I'll stop by your office when I get back from lunch. I'll get the details then.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Jackie, m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 khách c\u1ee7a khách s\u1ea1n chúng ta mu\u1ed1n xem dàn nh\u1ea1c giao h\u01b0\u1edfng bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n vào t\u1ed1i mai. Tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ebfn phòng vé vài l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1eb7t vé cho h\u1ecd, nh\u01b0ng tôi ch\u1ec9 nghe th\u1ea5y gi\u1ecdng nói ghi âm.
W-Am: À, tôi có m\u1ed9t t\u1eadp qu\u1ea3ng cáo v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n âm nh\u1ea1c c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n khác di\u1ec5n ra vào t\u1ed1i mai t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m khác. T\u1ea1i sao anh không h\u1ecfi khách xem h\u1ecd có mu\u1ed1n xem ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111ó không?
M-Cn: Tuy\u1ec7t! Tôi s\u1ebd ghé qua v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a cô sau khi \u0103n tr\u01b0a v\u1ec1. Lúc \u0111\u1ea5y tôi s\u1ebd xem thông tin chi ti\u1ebft.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Excuse me. I'm looking for a video camera. I've never bought one before, and I'm wondering if you could make some suggestions.

W-Br: Sure. It'll help, though, to know what your specific needs are and how much you'd like to spend.

M-Cn: Well, I plan to use it most when I go on vacation. I have a couple of trips coming up, and I'd like to record my experiences. I've never operated video equipment, though, so I'd like something that 's basic.

W-Br: In that case, I'd recommend the Sepler 83. I personally like this one the best because it's very easy to operate. Since this is your first video camera purchase, I'd probably get that one.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Xin l\u1ed7i. Tôi \u0111ang tìm m\u1ed9t máy quay phim. Tôi ch\u01b0a bao gi\u1edd mua m\u1ed9t cái nào tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây và tôi t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi li\u1ec7u cô có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 g\u1ee3i ý hay không.
W-Br: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Tuy nhiên, s\u1ebd h\u1eefu ích n\u1ebfu bi\u1ebft \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 và kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng chi c\u1ee7a ông.
M-Cn: À, tôi \u0111\u1ecbnh dùng nó ch\u1ee7 y\u1ebfu khi \u0111i ngh\u1ec9. S\u1eafp t\u1edbi tôi có m\u1ed9t vài chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i và tôi mu\u1ed1n ghi l\u1ea1i các tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m c\u1ee7a mình. Tuy nhiên, tôi ch\u01b0a bao gi\u1edd dùng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb quay phim, vì v\u1eady tôi mu\u1ed1n m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n.
W-Br: Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p \u0111ó, tôi mu\u1ed1n gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u chi\u1ebfc Sepler 83. Cá nhân tôi thích chi\u1ebfc này nh\u1ea5t vì nó r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng. Vì \u0111ây là l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u ông mua máy quay phim, nên có l\u1ebd tôi s\u1ebd l\u1ea5y cái \u0111ó.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Hey, Sunisa. We're about to leave to cater the event at Kimball Medical Foundation, but there aren't enough
cups. Do you know where I can find some?

W-Am: Oh no. I ordered some from our supplier two days ago, but they still haven't delivered them. This isn't the first time this has happened

M-Au: Well, we're supposed to start setting up our tables at Kimball Medical by nine-thirty, so what do you suggest? I don't have time to stop by a store on the way.

W-Am: OK, I can help out. I'll go buy more and bring them to you.

M-Au: Thanks. I'll text you when we get there, so you know where to find us
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Này, Sunisa. Chúng tôi chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb \u0111i \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i C\u01a1 s\u1edf Y t\u1ebf Kimball Medical, nh\u01b0ng không có \u0111\u1ee7 c\u1ed1c. Cô bi\u1ebft n\u01a1i nào có không?
W-Am: \u1ed2 không. Tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 t\u1eeb nhà cung c\u1ea5p c\u1ee7a chúng tôi hai ngày tr\u01b0\u1edbc, nh\u01b0ng h\u1ecd v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a giao \u0111\u1ebfn. \u0110ây không ph\u1ea3i là l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf này.
M-Au: Chà, chúng ta ph\u1ea3i b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u s\u1eafp bàn t\u1ea1i C\u01a1 s\u1edf Y t\u1ebf Kimball tr\u01b0\u1edbc chín gi\u1edd r\u01b0\u1ee1i, v\u1eady cô có \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb gì không? Tôi không có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 ghé qua c\u1eeda hàng trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111i.
W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i mua thêm và mang \u0111\u1ebfn cho anh.
M-Au: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Tôi s\u1ebd nh\u1eafn tin cho cô khi chúng tôi \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 cô bi\u1ebft ch\u1ed7 tìm chúng tôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Hi, Dorota. Markus and I wanted to stop by to welcome you to Emmerson BioTech. We interviewed a lot of chemistry majors for this summer internship, and you were our top pick.

M-Au: And while we're here, I can show you how to fill out the time sheets that you'll have to turn in to Payroll at the end of every week. Do you have time to go over that now?

W-Br: Well, I'm supposed to go to the main laboratory in a few minutes for an overview of the experiments that I'll be working on this summer.

W-Am: Oh, sorry. We should have mentioned this sooner. The lab is closed for cleaning today, so your lab orientation has been postponed until tomorrow.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào Dorota. Markus và tôi mu\u1ed1n ghé qua \u0111\u1ec3 chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Công ty Công ngh\u1ec7 sinh h\u1ecdc Emmerson. Chúng tôi \u0111ã ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u1ecdc các chuyên ngành liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn hóa h\u1ecdc cho k\u1ef3 th\u1ef1c t\u1eadp mùa hè này và b\u1ea1n là l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn hàng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.
M-Au: Và khi \u1edf \u0111ây, tôi có th\u1ec3 h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn b\u1ea1n \u0111i\u1ec1n vào các b\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian mà b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i có trong B\u1ea3ng l\u01b0\u01a1ng vào cu\u1ed1i m\u1ed7i tu\u1ea7n. Bây gi\u1edd b\u1ea1n có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 xem qua không?
W-Br: Chà, tôi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ebfn phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m chính trong vài phút n\u1eefa \u0111\u1ec3 xem t\u1ed5ng quan v\u1ec1 các thí nghi\u1ec7m mà tôi s\u1ebd th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n vào mùa hè này.
W-Am: \u1ed2, xin l\u1ed7i. Chúng tôi nên nói vi\u1ec7c này s\u1edbm h\u01a1n. Phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m \u0111óng c\u1eeda \u0111\u1ec3 d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p ngày hôm nay, vì v\u1eady bu\u1ed5i h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn v\u1ec1 phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoãn l\u1ea1i cho \u0111\u1ebfn ngày mai.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Thanks for this follow-up visit, Mr. Kessler. Your team did a nice job installing the parking area for my office building. It's smooth and even. However, as you can see, behind the building, the work was never finished. Only a few of the white stripes that mark the individual parking spots have been painted.

M-Cn: Hmm... Yes, I see. My team was supposed to paint that final section on Tuesday, but all the rain last week put us behind schedule.

W-Am: I hope you'll be able to take care of this soon.

M-Cn: Sure, that won't be a problem. I'll put you on the schedule right away, and we'll come by first thing tomorrow and get this all done for you.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n v\u1ec1 chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m ti\u1ebfp theo này, ông Kessler. \u0110\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a ông \u0111ã l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1eadu xe r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t cho tòa nhà v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi. Nó nh\u1eb5n thín và \u0111\u1ed3ng \u0111\u1ec1u. Tuy nhiên, nh\u01b0 ông có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y, \u0111\u1eb1ng sau tòa nhà, công vi\u1ec7c v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a xong. Ch\u1ec9 m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 s\u1ecdc tr\u1eafng \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u các \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ed7 xe riêng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u01a1n.
M-Cn: Hmm ... Vâng, tôi hi\u1ec3u. \u0110\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a tôi d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1ebd s\u01a1n ph\u1ea7n cu\u1ed1i cùng \u0111ó vào th\u1ee9 Ba, nh\u01b0ng c\u1ea3 tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc tr\u1eddi m\u01b0a \u0111ã khi\u1ebfn chúng tôi b\u1ecb ch\u1eadm ti\u1ebfn \u0111\u1ed9.
W-Am: Tôi hy v\u1ecdng ông s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này s\u1edbm.
M-Cn: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i, s\u1ebd không có v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ec3 cô lên l\u1ecbch ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c và chúng tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1edbm nh\u1ea5t vào ngày mai và hoàn thành vi\u1ec7c cho cô.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hello. I'm calling about my subscription to TV Trivia Magazine. I moved a few months ago, and I called to give you my new address at that time. But I've only received one issue since then. I'm wondering what the problem is. The name is Fernandez.

M-Au: OK, let me check... Oh yes, I see. Your subscription expired last month. Why don't you sign up for our online version of the magazine? We're running a promotional sale for 20 percent off digital subscriptions right now.

W-Br: Actually, I prefer to read the paper version. Can you provide the same discount for that? If you can, I'll renew right away.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u0103ng ký mua T\u1ea1p chí Chuy\u1ec7n phi\u1ebfm truy\u1ec1n hình. Tôi \u0111ã chuy\u1ec3n \u0111i m\u1ed9t vài tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc, và tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 thông báo \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a tôi vào lúc \u0111ó. Nh\u01b0ng tôi ch\u1ec9 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 báo k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb \u0111ó. Tôi \u0111ang t\u1ef1 h\u1ecfi có v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì. Tên \u0111\u0103ng ký là Fernandez.
M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, \u0111\u1ec3 tôi ki\u1ec3m tra ... \u1ed2 vâng, tôi th\u1ea5y r\u1ed3i. \u0110\u0103ng ký c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111ã h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc. T\u1ea1i sao b\u1ea1n không \u0111\u0103ng ký phiên b\u1ea3n t\u1ea1p chí tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi? Chúng tôi hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111ang th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình khuy\u1ebfn m\u1ea1i gi\u1ea3m giá 20% cho vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u0103ng ký s\u1ed1.

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Susan, thanks for watching us practice our presentation about this new marketing campaign.

M-Cn: Yes, we really appreciate it. Now that we've finished, do you have any comments? We're showing it to our
client next week, so your feedback will be really helpful.

W-Br: I'd emphasize more how you intend to reach a larger and more diverse customer base with this marketing campaign.

M-Au: Well, we are planning to use social media to reach younger people. Do you think that should be included in the presentation?

W-Br: Absolutely. The client will like that.

M-Cn: We'll get back to work then. But if you are free tomorrow, I'd like us to meet one more time to go over our revisions.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Susan, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n \u0111ã xem chúng tôi thuy\u1ebft trình v\u1ec1 chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb m\u1edbi này.
M-Cn: Vâng, chúng tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 \u0111ánh giá cao bài thuy\u1ebft trình. Gi\u1edd chúng ta xong r\u1ed3i, các b\u1ea1n có nh\u1eadn xét gì không? Chúng ta cho khách hàng xem vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi, vì v\u1eady ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t h\u1eefu ích.
W-Br: Tôi mu\u1ed1n nh\u1ea5n m\u1ea1nh h\u01a1n v\u1ec1 cách th\u1ee9c các b\u1ea1n d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn c\u01a1 s\u1edf khách hàng l\u1edbn h\u01a1n và \u0111a d\u1ea1ng h\u01a1n v\u1edbi chi\u1ebfn d\u1ecbch ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb này.
M-Au: Chà, chúng tôi \u0111ang có k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ea1ng xã h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ec3 ti\u1ebfp c\u1eadn nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tr\u1ebb h\u01a1n. B\u1ea1n có ngh\u0129 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó nên \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u01b0a vào bài thuy\u1ebft trình không?
W-Br: Hoàn toàn có th\u1ec3. Khách hàng s\u1ebd thích \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó.
M-Cn: Chúng ta s\u1ebd tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i làm vi\u1ec7c lúc \u0111ó. Nh\u01b0ng n\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n r\u1ea3nh vào ngày mai, tôi mu\u1ed1n chúng ta g\u1eb7p nhau m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa \u0111\u1ec3 xem l\u1ea1i các b\u1ea3n s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, Nadia. Our department manager mentioned you're training our new hires.

W-Am: Yeah, I still have a lot to do, and the training starts Monday. I've been so busy updating the training documents, I haven't had time to do anything else.

M-Cn: Well... I finished my project early... What do you need?

W-Am: Thank you so much. Could you check with the Security Office about the badges for the new employees? I sent them a request last week, but I haven't heard back yet.

M-Cn: No problem, I'll take care of that right away.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào Nadia. Giám \u0111\u1ed1c b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn nói cô \u0111ang \u0111ào t\u1ea1o nhân viên m\u1edbi.
W-Am: Vâng, tôi v\u1eabn còn nhi\u1ec1u vi\u1ec7c ph\u1ea3i làm, và khóa \u0111ào t\u1ea1o s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vào th\u1ee9 Hai. Tôi quá b\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt tài li\u1ec7u \u0111ào t\u1ea1o, tôi không có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 làm b\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì khác.
M-Cn: Chà ... Tôi \u0111ã hoàn thành d\u1ef1 án s\u1edbm ... B\u1ea1n có c\u1ea7n gì không?
W-Am: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n anh r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u. Anh có th\u1ec3 ki\u1ec3m tra các huy hi\u1ec7u cho nhân viên m\u1edbi v\u1edbi V\u0103n phòng An ninh không? Tôi \u0111ã g\u1eedi cho h\u1ecd yêu c\u1ea7u vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc, nh\u01b0ng tôi v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i.
M-Cn: Không sao, tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft vi\u1ec7c \u0111ó ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the man imply when he says, "I finished my project early"?
childrens.answers: ["He wants feedback on a task","He has time to offer assistance","He would like to leave for the day","He thinks he deserves a promotion"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông ám ch\u1ec9 \u0111i\u1ec1u gì khi anh ta nói, “Tôi \u0111ã hoàn thành d\u1ef1 án s\u1edbm”?<\/p>

A. Anh \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5.<\/p>

B. Anh \u1ea5y có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3.<\/p>

C. Anh \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n \u0111i trong ngày.<\/p>

D. Anh \u1ea5y ngh\u0129 r\u1eb1ng anh \u1ea5y x\u1ee9ng \u0111áng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u0103ng ch\u1ee9c.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111àn ông nói: “What do you need?”, \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó có ngh\u0129a là anh ta mu\u1ed1n giúp Nadia.<\/p>","en":"

What does the man imply when he says, “I finished my project early”?<\/p>

A. He wants feedback on a task.<\/p>

B. He has time to offer assistance.<\/p>

C. He would like to leave for the day.<\/p>

D. He thinks he deserves a promotion.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

“The man said after then,What do you need?”, it means he wanted to help Nadia.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: We're getting close to the airport, so we'd better stop to put gas in the car. The rental company will charge us an extra fee for fuel if they have to do it.

W-Br: Good idea. We don't want to pay more than we have to.

M-Cn: OK, should I take this exit then?

W-Br: No, that's a rest area. Keep going, we want the next exit.

M-Cn: Oh good, and I hope they also sell food. Then we can pick up some snacks for the plane while we're there.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chúng ta s\u1eafp \u0111\u1ebfn sân bay, vì v\u1eady chúng ta nên d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5 x\u0103ng. Công ty cho thuê s\u1ebd tính thêm phí x\u0103ng n\u1ebfu h\u1ecd ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1ed5.
W-Br: Ý hay \u0111\u1ea5y. Chúng ta không mu\u1ed1n tr\u1ea3 nhi\u1ec1u h\u01a1n nh\u1eefng gì chúng ta ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3.
M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi có nên \u0111i theo l\u1ed1i ra này không?
W-Br: Không, \u0111ó là khu v\u1ef1c ngh\u1ec9 ng\u01a1i. Ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111i, chúng ta mu\u1ed1n l\u1ed1i ra ti\u1ebfp theo.
M-Cn: \u1ed2 t\u1ed1t, và tôi hy v\u1ecdng h\u1ecd c\u0169ng bán \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n. Sau \u0111ó, chúng ta có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u1ed3 \u0103n nh\u1eb9 cho chuy\u1ebfn bay.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Anita, take a look at this travel Web site. Our hotel received some bad reviews - here's one of them.

W-Br: Wow, there are definitely areas we need to work on. With a review like that, I'm worried we won't attract as many customers.

M-Au: Well, at least we're renovating the rooms soon, so their appearance will improve.

W-Br: True. But let's discuss the other low rating at our next staff meeting.

M-Au: You know, maybe we should bring in a consultant to give us advice on how to deal with this-we certainly don't want any more bad reviews.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Anita, hãy xem trang web du l\u1ecbch này. Khách s\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111ánh giá không t\u1ed1t - \u0111ây là m\u1ed9t trong s\u1ed1 \u0111ó.
W-Br: \u1ed2, ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn có nh\u1eefng l\u0129nh v\u1ef1c chúng ta c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i làm vi\u1ec7c. V\u1edbi \u0111ánh giá nh\u01b0 v\u1eady, tôi lo r\u1eb1ng chúng tôi s\u1ebd không thu hút \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u khách hàng.
M-Au: Chà, ít nh\u1ea5t thì chúng tôi c\u0169ng s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i s\u1edbm s\u1eeda sang l\u1ea1i các phòng, \u0111\u1ec3 phòng trông \u0111\u1eb9p h\u01a1n.
W-Br: \u0110úng. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta hãy th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 \u0111ánh giá th\u1ea5p còn l\u1ea1i trong cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhân viên ti\u1ebfp theo.
M-Au: B\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ea5y, có l\u1ebd chúng ta nên nh\u1edd m\u1ed9t chuyên gia t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n cho l\u1eddi khuyên \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này - chúng tôi ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn không mu\u1ed1n có thêm b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 \u0111ánh giá x\u1ea5u nào n\u1eefa.<\/p>"}

Nhìn vào hình. H\u1ea1ng m\u1ee5c nào s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn trong cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhân viên ti\u1ebfp theo?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m.<\/p>

“But let's discuss the other low rating at our next staff meeting.”<\/p>

B\u1edfi vì h\u1ecd \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn di\u1ec7n m\u1ea1o c\u0103n phòng tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây nên nhìn hình ta th\u1ea5y x\u1ebfp h\u1ea1ng th\u1ea5p khác là d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 dành cho khách.  <\/p>","en":"

Look at the graphic. Which category will be discussed in the next staff meeting?<\/p>

A. Location.<\/p>

B. Hotel facilities.<\/p>

C. Guest services.<\/p>

D. Room appearance.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

“But let's discuss the other low rating at our next staff meeting.”<\/p>

Because they mentioned room appearance before, as shown in the graphic, the other low rating is guest services. <\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Good afternoon, Ms. Dembo. I have some concerns - can I show you the report on our pasta production this week?

W-Am: Sure. What's the problem exactly?

M-Cn: Well, according to page two of the report, the pasta-cutting machine in our production line was working at less than 50 percent capacity yesterday. We were not getting as much output as we usually
do.

W-Am: I see. Let's shut down that machine right away. And I'll have a technician look at the motor and blade immediately. We have to fill a large order of pasta this week-that machine must be working well
so that we can produce the order on time.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào bà Dembo. Tôi có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u0103n kho\u0103n - Tôi có th\u1ec3 cho bà xem báo cáo v\u1ec1 ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t mì \u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a chúng ta trong tu\u1ea7n này không?
W-Am: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 chính xác là gì?
M-Cn: Vâng, theo trang hai c\u1ee7a báo cáo, máy c\u1eaft mì \u1ed1ng trong dây chuy\u1ec1n s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u0111ã ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng v\u1edbi công su\u1ea5t d\u01b0\u1edbi 50% vào ngày hôm qua. Chúng ta không nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u s\u1ea3n l\u01b0\u1ee3ng nh\u01b0 th\u01b0\u1eddng l\u1ec7.
W-Am: Tôi hi\u1ec3u r\u1ed3i. Hãy ng\u1eebng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng máy \u0111ó ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c. Và tôi s\u1ebd cho m\u1ed9t k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên xem xét \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 và l\u01b0\u1ee1i dao ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c. Chúng ta ph\u1ea3i hoàn thành m\u1ed9t \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng mì \u1ed1ng l\u1edbn trong tu\u1ea7n này - chi\u1ebfc máy \u0111ó ph\u1ea3i ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1ec3 chúng ta có th\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng \u0111úng th\u1eddi gian.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio: M-Au: I'd like to start the meeting with some good news. We've been awarded a contract from Skycloud Aviation to design seats for their new aircraft. The contract calls for seats that can rotate, so travelers can face one another during the flight. Skycloud has given us a list of other specifications they'd like us to incorporate, based on feedback from their customers. I'll pass around the full specifications list now. Let's take a look at it and determine the best way to plan this project.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Tôi mu\u1ed1n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tin t\u1ed1t. Chúng ta \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng t\u1eeb hãng Hàng không Skycloud \u0111\u1ec3 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i cho máy bay m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng yêu c\u1ea7u các gh\u1ebf có th\u1ec3 xoay, vì v\u1eady du khách có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed1i m\u1eb7t v\u1edbi nhau trong su\u1ed1t chuy\u1ebfn bay. Skycloud \u0111ã cung c\u1ea5p cho chúng ta danh sách các thông s\u1ed1 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt khác mà h\u1ecd mu\u1ed1n chúng ta k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p, d\u1ef1a trên ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i t\u1eeb khách hàng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. Tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a danh sách thông s\u1ed1 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 cho m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi truy\u1ec1n nhau xem ngay bây gi\u1edd. Chúng ta cùng xem và xác \u0111\u1ecbnh cách t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1eadp k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch cho d\u1ef1 án này<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am: Hi, Ms. Lee. I'm calling to give you some Information: about the staffing transition plan since today is Angelo's last day in the office. As you suggested, Mariko will be taking over his job responsibilities. I had asked Angelo to train her to create invoices, but there's a team meeting this afternoon. So I decided to meet with her tomorrow and review the invoice process with her myself. Let me know if you or the other department managers have any questions. Bye.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"


W-Am: Xin chào, cô Lee. Tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p cho cô m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 thông tin v\u1ec1 k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ed5i nhân s\u1ef1 vì hôm nay là ngày làm vi\u1ec7c cu\u1ed1i cùng c\u1ee7a Angelo t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng. Nh\u01b0 cô \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t, Mariko s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ea3m nh\u1eadn trách nhi\u1ec7m công vi\u1ec7c. Tôi \u0111ã yêu c\u1ea7u Angelo h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn cô \u1ea5y \u0111\u1ec3 xu\u1ea5t hóa \u0111\u01a1n, nh\u01b0ng có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhóm chi\u1ec1u nay. Vì v\u1eady, tôi quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh g\u1eb7p cô \u1ea5y vào ngày mai và t\u1ef1 mình xem l\u1ea1i quy trình xu\u1ea5t hóa \u0111\u01a1n v\u1edbi cô \u1ea5y. Hãy cho tôi bi\u1ebft cô ho\u1eb7c các qu\u1ea3n lý b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn khác có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào hay không. T\u1ea1m bi\u1ec7t.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker mean when she says, "there's a team meeting this afternoon"?
childrens.answers: ["She will be late to another meeting","Materials need to be prepared","A staff member is busy","A project has already been completed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y nói, “có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhóm chi\u1ec1u nay”?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn mu\u1ed9n trong m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp khác.<\/p>

B. Nguyên li\u1ec7u c\u1ea7n chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t nhân viên \u0111ang b\u1eadn.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn thành.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Cô \u1ea5y nói tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó: “I had asked Angelo to train her to create invoices, [...] so she implied that Angelo is busy.”<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker mean when she says, “there's a team meeting this afternoon”?<\/p>

A. She will be late to another meeting.<\/p>

B. Materials need to be prepared.<\/p>

C. A staff member is busy.<\/p>

D. A project has already been completed.<\/p>###

Explanation: <\/p>

She said before: “I had asked Angelo to train her to create invoices, [...] so she implied that Angelo is busy.”<\/p>"}

C. K\u1ebft thúc m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t.<\/p>

Thông tin:<\/p>

- Mariko will be taking over his job responsibilities.<\/p>

- So I decided to meet with her [Markio] tomorrow and review the invoice process with her myself.<\/p>","en":"

A. Meet with Mariko.<\/p>

B. Attend a party for Angelo.<\/p>

C. Finish a proposal.<\/p>

D. Print a set of documents.<\/p>###

Information::<\/p>

- Mariko will be taking over his job responsibilities.<\/p>

- So I decided to meet with her [Markio] tomorrow and review the invoice process with her myself.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Br: Good evening. I'm Michelle Yoon for Radio 101.6. In today's business news, we'll talk about innovation in the automobile industry. The Kendris Company, a local manufacturer of automotive parts, has just invented a new type of brakes for cars. These brakes are made from a special lightweight material that cools down more quickly after use, which means these brakes will last much longer than ordinary brakes. Kendris, which was founded just three years ago, will demonstrate their new brakes at the Annual Innovation Trade Show in August before offering them for sale the following month. From Radio 101.6, I'm MichelleYoon.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi là Michelle Yoon c\u1ee7a \u0110ài 101.6. Trong b\u1ea3n tin kinh doanh hôm nay, chúng ta s\u1ebd nói v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed5i m\u1edbi trong ngành công nghi\u1ec7p ô tô. Công ty Kendris, m\u1ed9t hãng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t ph\u1ee5 tùng ô tô t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, v\u1eeba phát minh ra m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i phanh m\u1edbi cho ô tô. Nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc phanh này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm t\u1eeb m\u1ed9t v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u nh\u1eb9 \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t giúp ngu\u1ed9i nhanh h\u01a1n sau khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng, có ngh\u0129a là nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc phanh này s\u1ebd t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i lâu h\u01a1n nhi\u1ec1u so v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc phanh thông th\u01b0\u1eddng. Kendris, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thành l\u1eadp ch\u1ec9 3 n\u0103m tr\u01b0\u1edbc, s\u1ebd trình di\u1ec5n nh\u1eefng b\u1ed9 phanh m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd t\u1ea1i Tri\u1ec3n lãm Th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ed5i m\u1edbi H\u1eb1ng n\u0103m vào tháng 8 tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi chào bán chúng vào tháng sau. T\u1eeb \u0110ài 101.6, tôi là Michelle Yoon.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: Good evening! I'm Mark and I'll be your instructor for tonight's beginning pottery class. It's easy to get your clothes dirty here, so please make sure to wear an apron. You can find some at the back of the room. This introductory class runs for four weeks; then you can move on to an intermediate class, if you really enjoy pottery. Space is limited, so let me know if you think you might be interested. OK, to get started, our first project is a basic bowl. Let's take a look at some examples of previous student work to get you inspired.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin chào! Tôi là Mark và tôi s\u1ebd là ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn cho l\u1edbp h\u1ecdc làm g\u1ed1m nh\u1eadp môn t\u1ed1i nay. \u1ede \u0111ây r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 làm b\u1ea9n qu\u1ea7n áo, vì v\u1eady hãy nh\u1edb mang t\u1ea1p d\u1ec1. Các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 cái \u1edf phía sau phòng. L\u1edbp h\u1ecdc nh\u1eadp môn này s\u1ebd kéo dài trong b\u1ed1n tu\u1ea7n; sau \u0111ó các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 chuy\u1ec3n sang l\u1edbp trung c\u1ea5p, n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 yêu thích làm \u0111\u1ed3 g\u1ed1m. Không gian có h\u1ea1n, vì v\u1eady hãy cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n c\u1ea7n tôi ch\u1ec9 d\u1eabn. \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, d\u1ef1 án \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a chúng ta là m\u1ed9t cái bát c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n. Hãy cùng xem qua m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a các h\u1ecdc viên tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1ea5y c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng nhé.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Thank you for attending tonight's Fredrickstown Business Seminar. I'm excited to introduce our first speaker, Ms. Janet Colthrup. She's the founder of Colthrup Accounting. Her company specializes in international tax preparation and does business in more than twenty countries. Today she'll share some of the strategies she used when she started her firm ten years ago, working from her home. As we've done in previous sessions, if you have questions for our speaker, please write them on the cards provided on your seat. Seminar volunteers will collect these questions throughout the session and then give them to the speaker directly. Without further delay, please help me welcome Janet Colthrup!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n các b\u1ea1n \u0111ã tham d\u1ef1 H\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o Kinh doanh Fredrickstown t\u1ed1i nay. Tôi r\u1ea5t vui \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a chúng ta, bà Janet Colthrup. Bà là ng\u01b0\u1eddi sáng l\u1eadp c\u1ee7a Công ty K\u1ebf toán Colthrup. Công ty bà chuyên v\u1ec1 khai thu\u1ebf qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf và kinh doanh t\u1ea1i h\u01a1n 20 qu\u1ed1c gia. Hôm nay, bà s\u1ebd chia s\u1ebb m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c mà bà \u0111ã th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n khi b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u công ty cách \u0111ây m\u01b0\u1eddi n\u0103m, làm vi\u1ec7c t\u1ea1i nhà. Nh\u01b0 chúng ta \u0111ã làm trong các bu\u1ed5i tr\u01b0\u1edbc, n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n có câu h\u1ecfi cho di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3, vui lòng vi\u1ebft chúng vào các th\u1ebb \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cung c\u1ea5p t\u1ea1i ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i. Các tình nguy\u1ec7n viên c\u1ee7a h\u1ed9i th\u1ea3o s\u1ebd thu th\u1eadp nh\u1eefng câu h\u1ecfi này trong su\u1ed1t bu\u1ed5i và sau \u0111ó \u0111\u01b0a chúng tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp cho di\u1ec5n gi\u1ea3. Không ch\u1eadm tr\u1ec5 h\u01a1n n\u1eefa, chúng ta cùng chào \u0111ón Janet Colthrup!<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am: You're listening to News Around Town from WXP Radio out of Riverdale. City officials have reported that last weekend's fund-raising concert at Riverdale Outdoor Theater was a huge success. More than $15,000 was raised to fund the creation of a new city park downtown. Even though the original event was rescheduled due to rain, attendance was higher than expected. The city still needs to raise another $30,000 before construction can begin on the new park. For more Information: or to make a donation, please visit the Parks Department Web site.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: B\u1ea1n \u0111ang nghe Tin t\u1ee9c thành ph\u1ed1 t\u1eeb \u0110ài phát thanh WXP t\u1ea1i Riverdale. Các quan ch\u1ee9c thành ph\u1ed1 \u0111ã thông báo r\u1eb1ng bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c gây qu\u1ef9 cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc t\u1ea1i Nhà hát ngoài tr\u1eddi Riverdale \u0111ã thành công r\u1ef1c r\u1ee1. H\u01a1n 15.000 \u0111ô la \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c huy \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ec3 tài tr\u1ee3 cho vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t công viên m\u1edbi \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1. M\u1eb7c dù s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n ban \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ecb d\u1eddi l\u1ea1i do tr\u1eddi m\u01b0a, nh\u01b0ng l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 v\u1eabn \u0111ông h\u01a1n d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn. Thành ph\u1ed1 v\u1eabn c\u1ea7n huy \u0111\u1ed9ng thêm 30.000 \u0111ô la n\u1eefa tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi có th\u1ec3 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u xây d\u1ef1ng công viên m\u1edbi. \u0110\u1ec3 bi\u1ebft thêm thông tin ho\u1eb7c \u0111óng góp, vui lòng truy c\u1eadp trang web c\u1ee7a S\u1edf qu\u1ea3n lý Công viên.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: OK, the tour bus has stopped at this spot for a very special reason. The spectacular view from this side of the bridge is one of my favorites in the area. Across the river you can see the lovely town of Fremont. Today, it's a town known for its delicious local cuisine, but Fremont used to be an important port town where many products were traded. Merchants used to stop in Fremont to buy and sell their goods as they traveled along the river. Next we will stop for lunch at the Fremont Inn before continuing up the river.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, xe buýt du l\u1ecbch \u0111ã d\u1eebng \u1edf \u0111i\u1ec3m này vì m\u1ed9t lý do r\u1ea5t \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t. Khung c\u1ea3nh ngo\u1ea1n m\u1ee5c t\u1eeb phía bên này c\u1ee7a cây c\u1ea7u là m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec3m yêu thích c\u1ee7a tôi trong khu v\u1ef1c. Bên kia sông, các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 nhìn th\u1ea5y th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n Fremont xinh \u0111\u1eb9p. Ngày nay, \u0111ó là m\u1ed9t th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng v\u1edbi các món \u0103n \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ngon, nh\u01b0ng Fremont t\u1eebng là m\u1ed9t th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n c\u1ea3ng quan tr\u1ecdng, n\u01a1i buôn bán nhi\u1ec1u s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m. Các th\u01b0\u01a1ng gia th\u01b0\u1eddng d\u1eebng l\u1ea1i \u1edf Fremont \u0111\u1ec3 mua và bán hàng hóa c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd khi h\u1ecd \u0111i d\u1ecdc theo con sông. Ti\u1ebfp theo chúng ta s\u1ebd d\u1eebng chân \u0103n tr\u01b0a t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n Fremont tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c ng\u01b0\u1ee3c dòng sông.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Does your fitness tracker take too much effort to use? Well, not anymore with the Health
Monitor, which is worn around your wrist like a watch. With most wearable devices, you have to push a button in the middle of your exercise routine to access your heart rate tracker or to see how many calories you've burned. Who wants to do that? The Health Monitor will automatically display these features on its screen so you can see this Information: easily without interrupting your workout. Plus, the price of the Health Monitor has been reduced by ten percent for the next month in honor of its debut on the market, so order one now!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Trình theo dõi vi\u1ec7c th\u1ec3 d\u1ee5c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n có t\u1ed1n quá nhi\u1ec1u công s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng không? Chà, \u0111i\u1ec1u này s\u1ebd không còn n\u1eefa v\u1edbi Máy theo dõi s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111eo \u1edf c\u1ed5 tay c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc \u0111\u1ed3ng h\u1ed3. V\u1edbi h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb \u0111eo, b\u1ea1n ph\u1ea3i nh\u1ea5n nút \u1edf gi\u1eefa bài t\u1eadp c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 theo dõi nh\u1ecbp tim ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u1ec3 xem l\u01b0\u1ee3ng calo \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ed1t cháy. Ai mu\u1ed1n làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó ch\u1ee9? Máy theo dõi s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe s\u1ebd t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng hi\u1ec3n th\u1ecb các tính n\u0103ng này trên màn hình \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 xem thông tin này m\u1ed9t cách d\u1ec5 dàng mà không làm gián \u0111o\u1ea1n quá trình t\u1eadp luy\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. Thêm vào \u0111ó, giá c\u1ee7a Máy theo dõi s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1ea3m 10% trong tháng t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 chào m\u1eebng l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u ra m\u1eaft trên th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng, vì v\u1eady hãy \u0111\u1eb7t hàng ngay bây gi\u1edd!<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker mean when she says, "Who wants to do that"?
childrens.answers: ["A task is inconvenient","A project requires more volunteers","An event is no longer popular","An application period has begun"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói có ý gì khi cô \u1ea5y nói, “Ai mu\u1ed1n làm \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó ch\u1ee9?”<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 không thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án yêu c\u1ea7u nhi\u1ec1u tình nguy\u1ec7n viên h\u01a1n.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n không còn n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng.<\/p>

D. Th\u1eddi gian áp d\u1ee5ng \u0111ã b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó: “With most wearable devices, you have to push a button in the middle of your exercise routine to access your heart rate tracker or to see how many calories you've burned.”<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker mean when she says, “Who wants to do that?”<\/p>

A. A task is inconvenient.<\/p>

B. A project requires more volunteers.<\/p>

C. An event is no longer popular.<\/p>

D. An application period has begun.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

She mentioned before: “With most wearable devices, you have to push a button in the middle of your exercise routine to access your heart rate tracker or to see how many calories you've burned.”<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hello everyone, I hope you've enjoyed the sess ion s so far at this year's convention on video-game development. Our video-game association is proud to include many notable presenters today for amateur game developers like you. I have one change to announce for this afternoon. Unfortunately, due to illness Ms. Naoko Ito can't join us today. So, Mr. Jun Lee will substitute for Ms. Ito. He'll give a tutorial on designing platform software that can be used to create many different games. Also, don't forget to submit your feedback forms by the end of the day. All those who turn in forms will automatically
be entered in a contest for a tablet computer!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Xin chào t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi, tôi hy v\u1ecdng các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd thích ph\u1ea7n này t\u1ea1i h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb n\u0103m nay v\u1ec1 phát tri\u1ec3n trò ch\u01a1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed. Hi\u1ec7p h\u1ed9i trò ch\u01a1i \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed c\u1ee7a chúng tôi t\u1ef1 hào có nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuy\u1ebft trình \u0111áng chú ý ngày hôm nay cho các nhà phát tri\u1ec3n trò ch\u01a1i nghi\u1ec7p d\u01b0 nh\u01b0 các b\u1ea1n. Tôi có m\u1ed9t thay \u0111\u1ed5i cho thông báo chi\u1ec1u nay. R\u1ea5t ti\u1ebfc, do b\u1ecb b\u1ec7nh, bà Naoko Ito không th\u1ec3 tham gia cùng chúng ta hôm nay. Vì v\u1eady, ông Jun Lee s\u1ebd thay th\u1ebf cho bà Ito. Ông s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a ra h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn v\u1ec1 thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m n\u1ec1n t\u1ea3ng, cái có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra nhi\u1ec1u trò ch\u01a1i khác nhau. Ngoài ra, \u0111\u1eebng quên g\u1eedi các m\u1eabu ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n vào cu\u1ed1i ngày. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi n\u1ed9p s\u1ebd t\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ed9ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tham gia cu\u1ed9c thi dành cho máy tính b\u1ea3ng!<\/p>"}
