questions.text_audio: W-Am: Good morning. I called this staff meeting to discuss the reorganization of our warehouse. On average, each of you spends five minutes finding the products you need to complete an order for shipment. But, I think we can get that number down by making the most popular items easier to find. Here's a map of the warehouse. I've added some new shelving units between the order station and the employee lounge. That's where we'll place our high-demand products. Now, I'll need some people to help rearrange the inventory. So, if you're willing to work a few extra hours, please add your name to the sign-up sheet in my office.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin chào. Tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp nhân viên này \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp l\u1ea1i kho hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Trung bình, m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi trong s\u1ed1 các b\u1ea1n dành n\u0103m phút \u0111\u1ec3 tìm các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m mình c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ec3 hoàn thành m\u1ed9t \u0111\u01a1n hàng g\u1eedi \u0111i. Tuy nhiên, tôi ngh\u0129 chúng ta có th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3m con s\u1ed1 \u0111ó xu\u1ed1ng b\u1eb1ng cách làm cho các m\u1eb7t hàng ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn nh\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 tìm h\u01a1n. \u0110ây là b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 c\u1ee7a nhà kho. Tôi \u0111ã thêm m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb giá \u0111\u1ee1 m\u1edbi gi\u1eefa tr\u1ea1m \u0111\u1eb7t hàng và phòng ch\u1edd nhân viên. \u0110ó là n\u01a1i chúng ta s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7t các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m có nhu c\u1ea7u cao c\u1ee7a mình. Bây gi\u1edd, tôi s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi giúp s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp l\u1ea1i hàng t\u1ed3n kho. Vì v\u1eady, n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n s\u1eb5n sàng làm vi\u1ec7c thêm vài gi\u1edd, vui lòng \u0111i\u1ec1n tên vào b\u1ea3ng \u0111\u0103ng ký t\u1ea1i v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a tôi.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why is a change being made?
childrens.answers: ["To improve efficiency","To follow a safety procedure","To make some repairs","To prepare for new hires"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n thay \u0111\u1ed5i?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 nâng cao hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3.<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 tuân theo m\u1ed9t quy trình an toàn.<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa.<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho nh\u1eefng nhân viên m\u1edbi.<\/p>###

Thông tin:<\/p>

On average, each of you spends five minutes finding the products [...]. But, I think we can get that number down by making the most popular items easier to find. <\/p>","en":"

Why is a change being made?<\/p>

A. To improve efficiency.<\/p>

B. To follow a safety procedure.<\/p>

C. To make some repairs.<\/p>

D. To prepare for new hires.<\/p>###

Information::<\/p>

On average, each of you spends five minutes finding the products [...]. But, I think we can get that number down by making the most popular items easier to find. <\/p>"}

childrens.title: Look at the graphic. Where are the new shelves located?
childrens.answers: ["Area 1","Area 2","Area 3","Area 4"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"p>Nhìn vào hình. Các k\u1ec7 m\u1edbi n\u1eb1m \u1edf \u0111âu?<\/p>

A. Khu v\u1ef1c 1.<\/p>

B. Khu v\u1ef1c 2.<\/p>

C. Khu v\u1ef1c 3.<\/p>

D. Khu v\u1ef1c 4.<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

“I've added some new shelving units between the order station and the employee lounge.”<\/p>

Nh\u01b0 trong hình, Khu v\u1ef1c 4 n\u1eb1m gi\u1eefa tr\u1ea1m \u0111\u1eb7t hàng và phòng ch\u1edd c\u1ee7a nhân viên.<\/p>","en":"

Look at the graphic. Where are the new shelves located?<\/p>

A. Area 1.<\/p>

B. Area 2.<\/p>

C. Area 3.<\/p>

D. Area 4.<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

“I've added some new shelving units between the order station and the employee lounge.”<\/p>

As shown in the graphic, Area 4 is between the order station and the employee lounge.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker say listeners can find in the office?
childrens.answers: ["Some work badges","Some equipment manuals","A sign-up sheet","An employee handbook"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói nói ng\u01b0\u1eddi nghe có th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y gì trong v\u0103n phòng?<\/p>

A. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 huy hi\u1ec7u công vi\u1ec7c.<\/p>

B. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tài li\u1ec7u h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t t\u1edd \u0111\u0103ng ký.<\/p>

D. M\u1ed9t cu\u1ed1n s\u1ed5 tay nhân viên.<\/p>###

Thông tin:<\/p>

[...] please add your name to the sign-up sheet in my office.<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker say listeners can find in the office?<\/p>

A. Some work badges.<\/p>

B. Some equipment manuals.<\/p>

C. A sign-up sheet.<\/p>

D. An employee handbook.<\/p>###

Information::<\/p>

[...] please add your name to the sign-up sheet in my office.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: The regional manager will arrive tomorrow, so please ensure that all ____ documents are ready
childrens.answers: ["she","her","hers","herself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The regional manager will arrive tomorrow, so please ensure that all of her documents are ready.<\/p>###

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý khu v\u1ef1c s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày mai, vì v\u1eady hãy \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các tài li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã s\u1eb5n sàng.<\/p>

A. she (pron.)<\/p>

B. her (possessive adj.)<\/p>

C. hers (possessive pron.)<\/p>

D. herself (reflexive pron.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng là danh t\u1eeb documents nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb s\u1edf h\u1eefu.<\/p>","en":"

The regional manager will arrive tomorrow, so please ensure that all of her documents are ready.<\/p>###

A. she (pron.)<\/p>

B. her (possessive adj.)<\/p>

C. hers (possessive pron.)<\/p>

D. herself (reflexive pron.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right before the noun documents so we use a possessive adjective.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The historic Waldridge Building was constructed nearly 200 years ____
childrens.answers: ["away","enough","ago","still"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The historic Waldridge Building was constructed nearly 200 years ago.<\/p>###

Tòa nhà Waldridge l\u1ecbch s\u1eed \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng cách \u0111ây g\u1ea7n 200 n\u0103m.<\/p>

A. away<\/p>

B. enough<\/p>

C. ago<\/p>

D. still<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian + ago ch\u1ec9 kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian trong quá kh\u1ee9<\/p>","en":"

The historic Waldridge Building was constructed nearly 200 years ago.<\/p>###

A. away<\/p>

B. enough<\/p>

C. ago<\/p>

D. still<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

a period of time + ago shows a period of time in the past<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Consumers ____ enthusiastically to the new colors developed by Sanwell Paint
childrens.answers: ["responding","response","responsively","responded"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The historic Waldridge Building was constructed nearly 200 years ago.<\/p>###

Tòa nhà Waldridge l\u1ecbch s\u1eed \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây d\u1ef1ng cách \u0111ây g\u1ea7n 200 n\u0103m.<\/p>

A. away<\/p>

B. enough<\/p>

C. ago<\/p>

D. still<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian + ago ch\u1ec9 kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian trong quá kh\u1ee9<\/p>","en":"

Consumers responded enthusiastically to the new colors developed by Sanwell Paint.<\/p>###

A. responding (v-ing)<\/p>

B. response (v.)<\/p>

C. responsively (adv.)<\/p>

D. responded (v-ed)<\/p>###

Explanation:  <\/p>

To talk about what happend in the past, we use the past simple tense.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The ____ files contain your employment contract and Information: about our company
childrens.answers: ["directed","attached","interested","connected"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The attached files contain your employment contract and Information: about our company.<\/p>###

Các t\u1ec7p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm có h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng lao \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n và thông tin v\u1ec1 công ty c\u1ee7a chúng tôi.<\/p>

A. directed: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 d\u1eabn<\/p>

B. attached: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ính kèm<\/p>

C. interested: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quan tâm<\/p>

D. connected: \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i<\/p>","en":"

The attached files contain your employment contract and Information: about our company.<\/p>###

A. directed = controlled<\/p>

B. attached: joined to something<\/p>

C. interested: wanting to give your attention to something or learn more about it<\/p>

D. connected: having a link between them<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Please submit each reimbursement request ____ according to its category, as outlined in last month's memo
childrens.answers: ["separately","separateness","separates","separate"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Please submit each reimbursement request separately according to its category, as outlined in last month's memo.<\/p>###

Vui lòng g\u1eedi riêng t\u1eebng yêu c\u1ea7u hoàn tr\u1ea3 theo danh m\u1ee5c nh\u01b0 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nêu trong b\u1ea3n ghi nh\u1edb c\u1ee7a tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc.<\/p>

A. separately (adv.)<\/p>

B. separateness (n.)<\/p>

C. separates (v-s)<\/p>

D. separate (v.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb request nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb \u0111ó.<\/p>","en":"

Please submit each reimbursement request separately according to its category, as outlined in last month's memo.<\/p>###

A. separately (adv.)<\/p>

B. separateness (n.)<\/p>

C. separates (v-s)<\/p>

D. separate (v.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right after the verb request so we use an adverb to describe the verb.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Customers can wait in the reception area ____ our mechanics complete the car repairs
childrens.answers: ["whether","except","while","during"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Customers can wait in the reception area while our mechanics complete the car repairs.<\/p>###

Khách hàng có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ee3i \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c l\u1ec5 tân trong khi th\u1ee3 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1eeda xe.<\/p>

A. whether: có ... không (th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n s\u1ef1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn)<\/p>

B. except: ngo\u1ea1i tr\u1eeb<\/p>

C. while: trong khi (hai s\u1ef1 vi\u1ec7c \u1edf hai v\u1ebf di\u1ec5n ra \u0111\u1ed3ng th\u1eddi)<\/p>

D. during: trong su\u1ed1t (m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian)<\/p>","en":"

Customers can wait in the reception area while our mechanics complete the car repairs.<\/p>###

A. whether  - express a doubt or choice between two possibilities<\/p>

B. except - used before you mention the only thing or person about which a statement is not true<\/p>

C. while - at the same time as something else is happening<\/p>

D. during - all through a period of time<\/p>"}

childrens.title: No one without a pass will be granted ____ to the conference
childrens.answers: ["admission","is admitting","admitted","to admit"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

No one without a pass will be granted admission to the conference.<\/p>###

Không ai không có gi\u1ea5y phép ra vào mà \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép vào h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb.<\/p>

A. admission (n.)<\/p>

B. is admitting - the form of the verb in the present countinuous<\/p>

C. admitted (v-ed)<\/p>

D. to admit (to-v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

S + be + granted + sth: ai \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phép làm gì <\/p>","en":"

No one without a pass will be granted admission to the conference.<\/p>###

A. admission (n.)<\/p>

B. is admitting - the form of the verb in the present countinuous<\/p>

C. admitted (v-ed)<\/p>

D. to admit (to-v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

S + be + granted + sth: S be allowed to do sth<\/p>"}

childrens.title: To receive an electronic reminder when payment is due, set up an online account ____ Albright Bank
childrens.answers: ["of","about","over","with"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

To receive an electronic reminder when payment is due, set up an online account with Albright Bank.<\/p>###

\u0110\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1eddi nh\u1eafc \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed khi \u0111\u1ebfn h\u1ea1n thanh toán, hãy thi\u1ebft l\u1eadp tài kho\u1ea3n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Ngân hàng Albright.<\/p>

A. of<\/p>

B. about<\/p>

C. over<\/p>

D. with<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

account with sb\/sth: tài kho\u1ea3n v\u1edbi ai\/ cái gì<\/p>","en":"

To receive an electronic reminder when payment is due, set up an online account with Albright Bank.<\/p>###

A. of<\/p>

B. about<\/p>

C. over<\/p>

D. with<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

account with sb\/sth<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The registration fee is ____ refundable up to two weeks prior to the conference date
childrens.answers: ["fullest","fuller","fully","full"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The registration fee is fully refundable up to two weeks prior to the conference date.<\/p>###

Phí \u0111\u0103ng ký s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 trong vòng hai tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày di\u1ec5n ra h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb.<\/p>

A. fullest (adj. so sánh nh\u1ea5t)<\/p>

B. fuller (adj. so sánh h\u01a1n)<\/p>

C. fully (adv.)<\/p>

D. full (adj.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là tính t\u1eeb refundable nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The registration fee is fully refundable up to two weeks prior to the conference date.<\/p>###

A. fullest (superlative adj.)<\/p>

B. fuller (comparative adj.)<\/p>

C. fully (adv.)<\/p>

D. full (adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right before the adjective refundable so we use an adverb.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: All identifying Information: has been ____ from this letter of complaint so that it can be used for training purposes
childrens.answers: ["produced","extended","removed","resolved"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

All identifying Information: has been removed from this letter of complaint so that it can be used for training purposes.<\/p>###

T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 thông tin nh\u1eadn d\u1ea1ng \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xóa kh\u1ecfi lá th\u01b0 khi\u1ebfu n\u1ea1i này \u0111\u1ec3 nó có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng cho m\u1ee5c \u0111ích \u0111ào t\u1ea1o.<\/p>

A. produced: s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t<\/p>

B. extended: m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng<\/p>

C. removed: xóa b\u1ecf<\/p>

D. resolved: gi\u1ea3i quy\u1ebft<\/p>","en":"

All identifying Information: has been removed from this letter of complaint so that it can be used for training purposes.<\/p>###

A. produced = manufactured: made things to be sold<\/p>

B. extended: made something longer or larger<\/p>

C. removed: took sb\/sth away from a place<\/p>

D. resolved: found an acceptable solution to a problem<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ this time next year, Larkview Technology will have acquired two new subsidiaries
childrens.answers: ["To","By","Quite","Begin"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

By this time next year, Larkview Technology will have acquired two new subsidiaries.<\/p>###

Vào th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m này n\u0103m sau, hãng Công ngh\u1ec7 Larkview s\u1ebd thu l\u1ea1i hai công ty con m\u1edbi.<\/p>

A. To (prep.): nh\u1eafm t\u1edbi<\/p>

B. By (prep.): vào lúc, tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi<\/p>

C. Quite (adv.): khá<\/p>

D. Begin (v.): b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích: <\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là m\u1ed9t c\u1ee5m t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 th\u1eddi gian this time next year nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb ch\u1ec9 th\u1eddi gian.<\/p>","en":"

By this time next year, Larkview Technology will have acquired two new subsidiaries.<\/p>###

A. To (prep.) = towards<\/p>

B. By (prep.): not later than the time mentioned; before<\/p>

C. Quite = fairly (adv.)<\/p>

D. Begin (v.) = start<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right before the phrase of time this time next year so we use a preposition of time.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Table reservations for ____ greater than ten must be made at least one day in advance
childrens.answers: ["plates","meals","sizes","parties"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Table reservations for parties greater than ten must be made at least one day in advance.<\/p>###

Vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1eb7t bàn cho nh\u1eefng b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c l\u1edbn h\u01a1n m\u01b0\u1eddi ng\u01b0\u1eddi ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t tr\u01b0\u1edbc ít nh\u1ea5t m\u1ed9t ngày.<\/p>

A. plates: \u0111\u0129a \u0103n<\/p>

B. meals: b\u1eefa \u0103n<\/p>

C. sizes: kích c\u1ee1<\/p>

D. parties: b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c<\/p>","en":"

Table reservations for parties greater than ten must be made at least one day in advance.<\/p>###

A. plates = dishes<\/p>

B. meals: occasions when people eat food<\/p>

C. sizes: how large or small a person or thing is<\/p>

D. parties: social occasions, often in a person’s home, at which people eat, drink, talk, dance and enjoy themselves<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Because of ____ weather conditions, tonight's concert in Harbin Park has been canceled
childrens.answers: ["worsening","worsens","worsen","worst"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Because of worsening weather conditions, tonight's concert in Harbin Park has been canceled.<\/p>###

Vì \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft x\u1ea5u \u0111i, bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n t\u1ed1i nay \u1edf Công viên Cáp Nh\u0129 Tân \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y b\u1ecf.<\/p>

A. worsening (v-ing)<\/p>

B. worsens (v-s)<\/p>

C. worsen (v.)<\/p>

D. worst (superlative adj.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Because of + V-ing<\/p>","en":"

Because of worsening weather conditions, tonight's concert in Harbin Park has been canceled.<\/p>###

A. worsening (v-ing)<\/p>

B. worsens (v-s)<\/p>

C. worsen (v.)<\/p>

D. worst (superlative adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Because of + V-ing<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Ms. AI-Omani will rely ____ team leaders to develop employee incentive programs
childrens.answers: ["onto","into","within","upon"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ms. Al-Omani will rely upon team leaders to develop employee incentive programs.<\/p>###

Bà Al-Omani s\u1ebd d\u1ef1a vào các tr\u01b0\u1edfng nhóm \u0111\u1ec3 phát tri\u1ec3n các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình khích l\u1ec7 nhân viên.<\/p>

A. onto<\/p>

B. into<\/p>

C. within<\/p>

D. upon<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

rely upon\/on sb\/th: d\u1ef1a vào ai\/cái gì<\/p>","en":"

Ms. Al-Omani will rely upon team leaders to develop employee incentive programs.<\/p>###

A. onto<\/p>

B. into<\/p>

C. within<\/p>

D. upon<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

rely upon\/on sb\/th<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Survey ____ analyze the layout of a land area above and below ground level
childrens.answers: ["technicians","technically","technical","technicality"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Survey technicians analyze the layout of a land area above and below ground level.<\/p>###

Các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên kh\u1ea3o sát phân tích cách b\u1ed1 trí c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t khu \u0111\u1ea5t trên và d\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111\u1ed9 cao m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ea5t.<\/p>

A. technicians (pl. n.)<\/p>

B. technically (adv.)<\/p>

C. technical (adj.)<\/p>

D. technicality (abstract n.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chia \u1edf d\u1ea1ng s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u analyze nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u làm ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef.<\/p>","en":"

Survey technicians analyze the layout of a land area above and below ground level.<\/p>###

A. technicians (pl. n.)<\/p>

B. technically (adv.)<\/p>

C. technical (adj.)<\/p>

D. technicality (abstract n.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right before the plural verb analyze so we use a plural noun acting as a subject.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ assemble your Gessen product, first read all instructions and gather all required tools
childrens.answers: ["For the purpose of","To be sure","In order to","For example"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

In order to assemble your Gessen product, first read all instructions and gather all required tools.<\/p>###

\u0110\u1ec3 l\u1eafp ráp s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m Gessen, tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên hãy \u0111\u1ecdc t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn và thu th\u1eadp t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các công c\u1ee5 c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft.<\/p>

A. For the purpose of + N\/V-ing: có m\u1ee5c \u0111ích <\/p>

B. To be sure + clause: \u0111\u1ec3 ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1eb1ng<\/p>

C. In order to + V: \u0111\u1ec3 (làm gì)<\/p>

D. For example: ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n - \u0111\u1ee9ng \u0111\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t câu <\/p>","en":"

In order to assemble your Gessen product, first read all instructions and gather all required tools.<\/p>###

A. For the purpose of + N\/V-ing<\/p>

B. To be sure + clause<\/p>

C. In order to + V<\/p>

D. For example - sits at the beginning of a sentence<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Online shoppers who experience long waits for their orders tend ____ the business low ratings
childrens.answers: ["have given","gave","to give","giving"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Online shoppers who experience long waits for their orders tend to give the business low ratings.<\/p>###

Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi mua s\u1eafm tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn ph\u1ea3i ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1eb7t hàng lâu có xu h\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111ánh giá th\u1ea5p doanh nghi\u1ec7p.<\/p>

A. have given - chia \u1edf thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành<\/p>

B. gave - chia \u1edf thì quá kh\u1ee9 \u0111\u01a1n<\/p>

C. to give (to v)<\/p>

D. giving (v-ing)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

tend + to V: có xu h\u01b0\u1edbng làm gì<\/p>","en":"

Online shoppers who experience long waits for their orders tend to give the business low ratings.<\/p>###

A. have given - used in the present perfect<\/p>

B. gave - used in the past simple<\/p>

C. to give (to v)<\/p>

D. giving (v-ing)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

tend + to V<\/p>"}

childrens.title: ____ of the new Delran train station will begin in late September
childrens.answers: ["Association","Construction","Violation","Comprehension"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Construction of the new Delran train station will begin in late September.<\/p>###

Vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng ga xe l\u1eeda Delran m\u1edbi s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vào cu\u1ed1i tháng 9.<\/p>

A. Association: S\u1ef1 k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p<\/p>

B. Construction: Vi\u1ec7c xây d\u1ef1ng<\/p>

C. Violation: S\u1ef1 vi ph\u1ea1m<\/p>

D. Comprehension: S\u1ef1 l\u0129nh h\u1ed9i<\/p>","en":"

Construction of the new Delran train station will begin in late September.<\/p>###

A. Association: a connection or relationship between people or organizations<\/p>

B. Construction: the process or method of building or making something<\/p>

C. Violation: the act of going against or refusing to obey a law, an agreement, etc.<\/p>

D. Comprehension: the ability to understand<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The computing power of the new laptop is ____ to any desktop computer in the same price range
childrens.answers: ["compare","comparing","comparison","comparable"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The computing power of the new laptop is comparable to any desktop computer in the same price range.<\/p>###

Kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng tính toán c\u1ee7a máy tính xách tay m\u1edbi có th\u1ec3 so sánh v\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 máy tính \u0111\u1ec3 bàn nào trong cùng t\u1ea7m giá.<\/p>

A. compare (v.)<\/p>

B. comparing (v-ing)<\/p>

C. comparison (n.)<\/p>

D. comparable (adj.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng c\u1ea7n \u0111i\u1ec1n là \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb to be is nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The computing power of the new laptop is comparable to any desktop computer in the same price range.<\/p>###

A. compare (v.)<\/p>

B. comparing (v-ing)<\/p>

C. comparison (n.)<\/p>

D. comparable (adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The blank is right after the verb is so we use an adjective.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Dr. Yuina Hashimoto recently added another doctor to her practice, ____ allowing more patients to be seen
childrens.answers: ["that","thus","which","so that"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Dr. Yuina Hashimoto recently added another doctor to her practice, thus allowing more patients to be seen.<\/p>###

Bác s\u0129 Yuina Hashimoto g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã thêm m\u1ed9t bác s\u0129 khác vào phòng khám c\u1ee7a bà \u1ea5y, nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf cho phép nhi\u1ec1u b\u1ec7nh nhân h\u01a1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c khám.<\/p>

A. that + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1<\/p>

B. thus + V-ing: nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf, vì th\u1ebf <\/p>

C. which + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1\/ V+ O (m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1 quan h\u1ec7)<\/p>

D. so that = in order that + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1: \u0111\u1ec3 ...<\/p>","en":"

Dr. Yuina Hashimoto recently added another doctor to her practice, thus allowing more patients to be seen.<\/p>###

A. that + clause<\/p>

B. thus + V-ing: in this way, like this <\/p>

C. which + clause\/ V+ O (relative clause)<\/p>

D. so that = in order that + clause<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Graden Hotel ____ its superior reputation thanks to the leadership of its president, Marcia Clemente
childrens.answers: ["practiced","treated","heard","earned"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Graden Hotel earned its superior reputation thanks to the leadership of its president, Marcia Clemente.<\/p>###

Khách s\u1ea1n Graden có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c danh ti\u1ebfng v\u01b0\u1ee3t tr\u1ed9i nh\u1edd s\u1ef1 lãnh \u0111\u1ea1o c\u1ee7a ch\u1ee7 t\u1ecbch Marcia Clemente.<\/p>

A. practiced: th\u1ef1c hành<\/p>

B. treated: \u0111\u1ed1i x\u1eed<\/p>

C. heard: nghe<\/p>

D. earned: có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c<\/p>","en":"

Graden Hotel earned its superior reputation thanks to the leadership of its president, Marcia Clemente.<\/p>###

A. practiced: did an activity or train regularly<\/p>

B. treated: behave towards sb\/sth<\/p>

C. heard: was\/ were aware of sounds with your ears<\/p>

D. earned: got something that you deserved<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Aki Katsuro's latest novel is his most exciting ____ and is sure to make Radin Books' best-seller list
childrens.answers: ["just","later","yet","very"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Aki Katsuro's latest novel is his most exciting yet and is sure to make Radin Books' best-seller list.<\/p>###

Cu\u1ed1n ti\u1ec3u thuy\u1ebft m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Aki Katsuro là cu\u1ed1n ti\u1ec3u thuy\u1ebft thú v\u1ecb nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a ông \u1ea5y cho \u0111\u1ebfn gi\u1edd và ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn s\u1ebd l\u1ecdt vào danh sách bán ch\u1ea1y nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a Radin Books.<\/p>

A. just<\/p>

B. later<\/p>

C. yet<\/p>

D. very<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

tính t\u1eeb\/ tr\u1ea1ng t\u1eeb so sánh nh\u1ea5t + yet: ... nh\u1ea5t cho \u0111\u1ebfn gi\u1edd<\/p>","en":"

Aki Katsuro's latest novel is his most exciting yet and is sure to make Radin Books' best-seller list.<\/p>###

A. just<\/p>

B. later<\/p>

C. yet<\/p>

D. very<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

the superlative adj.\/adv. + yet: the superlative adj.\/adv.  until now<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Thanks ____ to pastry chef Ana Villagra, Lauducci's Restaurant has become a favorite with local patrons
childrens.answers: ["largely","larger","large","largest"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Thanks largely to pastry chef Ana Villagra, Lauducci's Restaurant has become a favorite with local patrons.<\/p>###

Ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn nh\u1edd vào \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp bánh ng\u1ecdt Ana Villagra, Nhà hàng Lauducci \u0111ã tr\u1edf thành \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 yêu thích c\u1ee7a nh\u1eefng th\u1ef1c khách \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng.<\/p>

A. largely (adv.)<\/p>

B. larger (comparative adj.)<\/p>

C. large (adj.)<\/p>

D. largest (superlative adj.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Thanks + adv. + to + N<\/p>","en":"

Thanks largely to pastry chef Ana Villagra, Lauducci's Restaurant has become a favorite with local patrons.<\/p>###

A. largely (adv.)<\/p>

B. larger (comparative adj.)<\/p>

C. large (adj.)<\/p>

D. largest (superlative adj.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Thanks + adv. + to + N<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At Crintack Manufacturing, we acknowledge our ____ to provide a safe workplace for our employees
childrens.answers: ["assumption","valuation","perception","obligation"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

At Crintack Manufacturing, we acknowledge our obligation to provide a safe workplace for our employees.<\/p>###

T\u1ea1i hãng s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t Crintack, chúng tôi có ngh\u0129a v\u1ee5 cung c\u1ea5p m\u1ed9t n\u01a1i làm vi\u1ec7c an toàn cho nhân viên c\u1ee7a mình.<\/p>

A. assumption: s\u1ef1 gi\u1ea3 \u0111inh<\/p>

B. valuation: s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh giá<\/p>

C. perception: s\u1ef1 nh\u1eadn th\u1ee9c<\/p>

D. obligation: ngh\u0129a v\u1ee5, b\u1ed5n ph\u1eadn<\/p>","en":"

At Crintack Manufacturing, we acknowledge our obligation to provide a safe workplace for our employees.<\/p>###

A. assumption: something that you accept as true without question or proof<\/p>

B. valuation: a professional judgement about how much money something is worth<\/p>

C. perception: an idea, a belief or an image you have as a result of how you see or understand something<\/p>

D. obligation: the state of being forced to do something because it is your duty, or because of a law, etc.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: _____ Mr. Donovan had expected the charity event to be a success, the response from the community still overwhelmed him
childrens.answers: ["Whenever","Although","Even so","In spite of"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Although Mr. Donovan had expected the charity event to be a success, the response from the community still overwhelmed him.<\/p>###

M\u1eb7c dù ông Donovan \u0111ã k\u1ef3 v\u1ecdng s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n t\u1eeb thi\u1ec7n s\u1ebd thành công t\u1ed1t \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u01b0ng s\u1ef1 h\u01b0\u1edfng \u1ee9ng t\u1eeb c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1eabn khi\u1ebfn ông choáng ng\u1ee3p.<\/p>

A. Whenever: B\u1ea5t c\u1ee9 khi nào<\/p>

B. Although: M\u1eb7c dù<\/p>

C. Even so: Dù r\u1eb1ng<\/p>

D. In spite of = despite + N\/V-ing : M\u1eb7c dù<\/p>","en":"

Although Mr. Donovan had expected the charity event to be a success, the response from the community still overwhelmed him.<\/p>###

A. Whenever: at any time that<\/p>

B. Although - used for introducing a statement that makes the main statement in a sentence seem surprising<\/p>

C. Even so = despite that<\/p>

D. In spite of = despite + N\/V-ing<\/p>"}

childrens.title: This free mobile app provides ____ calendar updates , so salespeople will never miss an appointment
childrens.answers: ["casual","equal","continual","eventual"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

This free mobile app provides continual calendar updates, so salespeople will never miss an appointment.<\/p>###

\u1ee8ng d\u1ee5ng di \u0111\u1ed9ng mi\u1ec5n phí này cung c\u1ea5p c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt l\u1ecbch liên t\u1ee5c, vì v\u1eady nhân viên bán hàng s\u1ebd không bao gi\u1edd b\u1ecf l\u1ee1 cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n.<\/p>

A. casual: bình th\u01b0\u1eddng<\/p>

B. equal: bình \u0111\u1eb3ng<\/p>

C. continual: liên t\u1ee5c<\/p>

D. eventual: sau cùng<\/p>","en":"

This free mobile app provides continual calendar updates, so salespeople will never miss an appointment.<\/p>###

A. casual: not formal<\/p>

B. equal: the same in size, quantity, value, etc. as something else<\/p>

C. continual: repeated many times in a way that is annoying<\/p>

D. eventual: happening at the end of a period of time or of a process<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Most senior managers approved the architect's proposal for the office layout, although ____ expressed concerns about the cost
childrens.answers: ["one","one another","each other","other"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Most senior managers approved the architect's proposal for the office layout, although one expressed concerns about the cost.<\/p>###

H\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các nhà qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ea5p cao \u0111ã ch\u1ea5p thu\u1eadn \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a ki\u1ebfn trúc s\u01b0 v\u1ec1 cách b\u1ed1 trí v\u0103n phòng, m\u1eb7c dù m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi bày t\u1ecf lo ng\u1ea1i v\u1ec1 chi phí.<\/p>

A. one - dùng thay th\u1ebf cho danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 ít \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó<\/p>

B. one another - m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi\/ cái khác (trong m\u1ed9t nhóm)<\/p>

C. each other - m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi\/ cái khác<\/p>

D. other - ng\u01b0\u1eddi\/ cái khác<\/p>","en":"

Most senior managers approved the architect's proposal for the office layout, although one expressed concerns about the cost.<\/p>###

A. one - used to replace the singular noun mentioned before.<\/p>

B. one another - used when you are saying that each member of a group does something to or for the other people in the group<\/p>

C. each other - used as the object of a verb or preposition to show that each member of a group does something to or for the other members<\/p>

D. other - used to refer to people or things that are additional or different to people or things that have been mentioned or are known about<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Greenville Library has hired an office assistant not only to perform general office duties ____ to support an ongoing special project
childrens.answers: ["but also","only if","other than","as for"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Greenville Library has hired an office assistant not only to perform general office duties but also to support an ongoing special project.<\/p>###

Th\u01b0 vi\u1ec7n Greenville \u0111ã tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t tr\u1ee3 lý v\u0103n phòng không ch\u1ec9 \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n các nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 chung c\u1ee7a v\u0103n phòng mà còn \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 m\u1ed9t d\u1ef1 án \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u0111ang di\u1ec5n ra.<\/p>

A. but also<\/p>

B. only if<\/p>

C. other than<\/p>

D. as for<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

not only ... but also: không nh\u1eefng ... mà còn<\/p>","en":"

Greenville Library has hired an office assistant not only to perform general office duties but also to support an ongoing special project.<\/p>###

A. but also<\/p>

B. only if<\/p>

C. other than<\/p>

D. as for<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

not only ... but also - used to emphasize that something else is also true<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The lease with The Pawlicki Group ____ if modifications to the existing offices are made
childrens.answers: ["had continued","will be continued","was continuing","has been continuing"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

The lease with The Pawlicki Group will be continued if modifications to the existing offices are made.<\/p>###

H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng cho thuê v\u1edbi T\u1eadp \u0111oàn Pawlicki s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c n\u1ebfu các s\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi các v\u0103n phòng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n.<\/p>

A. had continued - chia \u1edf thì quá kh\u1ee9 hoàn thành<\/p>

B. will be continued - th\u1ec3 b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng \u1edf thì t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai \u0111\u01a1n<\/p>

C. was continuing - chia \u1edf thì quá kh\u1ee9 ti\u1ebfp di\u1ec5n<\/p>

D. has been continuing - chia \u1edf thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành ti\u1ebfp di\u1ec5n<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef The lease ch\u1ecbu tác \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a hành \u0111\u1ed9ng continue nên ta dùng th\u1ec3 b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng.<\/p>","en":"

The lease with The Pawlicki Group will be continued if modifications to the existing offices are made.<\/p>###

A. had continued - used in the past perfect<\/p>

B. will be continued - passive voice in the future simple<\/p>

C. was continuing - used in the past continuous<\/p>

D. has been continuing - used in the present perfect continuous<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The subject The lease receives the action of the verb continue so we use passive voice.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Wrazen Associates ____ a summary with a list of recommendations as a routine part of any audit
childrens.answers: ["realizes","induces","causes","issues"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Wrazen Associates issues a summary with a list of recommendations as a routine part of any audit.<\/p>###

Liên hi\u1ec7p Wrazen \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t b\u1ea3n tóm t\u1eaft v\u1edbi danh sách các khuy\u1ebfn ngh\u1ecb nh\u01b0 m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên c\u1ee7a b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 cu\u1ed9c ki\u1ec3m toán nào.<\/p>

A. realizes: nh\u1eadn ra<\/p>

B. induces: thuy\u1ebft ph\u1ee5c<\/p>

C. causes: gây ra<\/p>

D. issues: \u0111\u01b0a ra, công b\u1ed1<\/p>","en":"

Wrazen Associates issues a summary with a list of recommendations as a routine part of any audit.<\/p>###

A. realizes: understands or becomes aware of a particular fact or situation<\/p>

B. induces: persuades or influences somebody to do something<\/p>

C. causes: makes something happen<\/p>

D. issues: makes something known formally<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
From: Facilities Department
To: All Staff
Subject: AC issues
Date: 4 February

Please be advised that an equipment contractor, Torrono Sheet Metal, is scheduled to start work on the chiller enclosure at the rear of the building tomorrow morning. The contractor will be installing a steel cover to __(1)__ protect the inner workings of our heating and cooling equipment. Expect to see technicians entering and leaving the building repeatedly, carting large machine parts and tools. There will be some noise associated with this project, and we ask for your patience. __(2)__ , you should probably look for on-street parking. The contractor's vans __(3)__ much of the driveway. __(4)__

Jorge Carreras, Facilities Director
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Phòng C\u01a1 s\u1edf v\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Các v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1ec1 máy \u0111i\u1ec1u hòa không khí<\/p>

Ngày: 4 tháng 2<\/p>

Xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t nhà th\u1ea7u thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb, Công ty t\u1ea5m kim lo\u1ea1i Torrono, d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u công vi\u1ec7c x\u1eed lý v\u1ecf máy làm l\u1ea1nh \u1edf phía sau tòa nhà vào sáng mai. Nhà th\u1ea7u s\u1ebd l\u1eafp \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ed9t l\u1edbp v\u1ecf thép \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng bên trong c\u1ee7a thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb s\u01b0\u1edfi và làm mát c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Các k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên s\u1ebd ra vào tòa nhà liên t\u1ee5c, di chuy\u1ec3n các b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn máy móc và công c\u1ee5 l\u1edbn. Công vi\u1ec7c s\u1ebd gây ra ti\u1ebfng \u1ed3n và chúng tôi mong các b\u1ea1n nh\u1eabn n\u1ea1i. Ngoài ra, các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 nên tìm ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1eadu xe trên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng. Xe t\u1ea3i c\u1ee7a nhà th\u1ea7u s\u1ebd ch\u1eb7n ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng lái xe. Công vi\u1ec7c d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd hoàn thành tr\u01b0\u1edbc 2:00 chi\u1ec1u.<\/p>

Jorge Carreras, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c C\u01a1 s\u1edf v\u1eadt ch\u1ea5t<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
To: Melina Ramos Sandoval
From: [email protected]
Date: 25 October
Subject: Registration complete

Dear Ms. Sandoval,

Welcome to the Source Work jobs network, the leading online career matching service. Your e-mail address, work experience, and preferences __(1)__ in our database. This Information: will be used to identify employers who are seeking job candidates just like __(2)__ . In the future, you will receive periodic notifications about open positions in your area. __(3)__ . Therefore, we will not share your name or address with anyone. At any point, you can select the link at the bottom of any e-mail you receive from us to unsubscribe or change your e-mail preferences.

Thank you for __(4)__ . If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us.

Sincerely,

The Source Work team
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Melina Ramos Sandoval<\/p>

T\u1eeb: [email \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7]<\/p>

Ngày: 25 tháng 10<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: \u0110\u0103ng ký hoàn t\u1ea5t<\/p>

Kính g\u1eedi cô Sandoval,<\/p>

Chào m\u1eebng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi m\u1ea1ng vi\u1ec7c làm Source Work, d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i ngh\u1ec1 nghi\u1ec7p tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn hàng \u0111\u1ea7u. \u0110\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 e-mail, kinh nghi\u1ec7m làm vi\u1ec7c và s\u1edf thích c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi l\u1ea1i trong c\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Thông tin này s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3 xác \u0111\u1ecbnh các nhà tuy\u1ec3n d\u1ee5ng \u0111ang tìm ki\u1ebfm \u1ee9ng viên gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 b\u1ea1n. Trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai, b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông báo \u0111\u1ecbnh k\u1ef3 v\u1ec1 các v\u1ecb trí m\u1edf trong khu v\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n. C\u01a1 s\u1edf d\u1eef li\u1ec7u vi\u1ec7c làm c\u1ee7a chúng tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt h\u1eb1ng tu\u1ea7n. Vì v\u1eady, chúng tôi s\u1ebd không chia s\u1ebb tên ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n v\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 ai. T\u1ea1i b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m nào, b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecdn liên k\u1ebft \u1edf cu\u1ed1i b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 e-mail nào mà b\u1ea1n nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1eeb chúng tôi \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ee7y \u0111\u0103ng ký ho\u1eb7c thay \u0111\u1ed5i tùy ch\u1ecdn e-mail c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n.<\/p>

C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã \u0111\u0103ng ký. N\u1ebfu b\u1ea1n có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi ho\u1eb7c nh\u1eadn xét nào, vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi chúng tôi.<\/p>

Trân tr\u1ecdng,<\/p>

Nhóm Source Work<\/p>"}

N\u1ed9i dung c\u1ee7a câu di\u1ec5n t\u1ea3 hành \u0111\u1ed9ng trong quá kh\u1ee9 có liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i nên ta dùng thì hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i hoàn thành.<\/p>","en":"

The blank is right after the list of nouns as a subject, so we use a verb. <\/p>

questions.text_read:
From: Noora Simola, Vice President of Operations
To: All Employees
Date: February 8
Re: Payroll changes

Beginning on March 15, we will be using a new payroll service that will affect a number of our current payroll processes. First, weekly payroll checks will be mailed on Thursday instead of Friday. Direct-deposit payroll payments will also be processed a day __(1)__ . Second, pay stubs for direct-deposit payments will no longer bee-mailed. Instead, employees will be able to __(2)__ this Information: by accessing their payroll accounts online. Other processes will remain the same. All time cards will continue to be due to the payroll department by Monday at 6:00P.M. __(3)__ . A complete, updated list of instructions for payroll procedures __(4)__ to all employees on or before March 1. If you have any questions before then, please contact Leonti Belousov at ext. 5810.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: Noora Simola, Phó Giám \u0111\u1ed1c \u0110i\u1ec1u hành<\/p>

\u0110\u1ebfn: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên<\/p>

Ngày: 8 tháng 2<\/p>

Tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi: Thay \u0111\u1ed5i b\u1ea3ng l\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

B\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb ngày 15 tháng 3, chúng ts s\u1ebd s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 tính l\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1edbi s\u1ebd \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 quy trình tính l\u01b0\u01a1ng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i. \u0110\u1ea7u tiên, b\u1ea3ng kê khai l\u01b0\u01a1ng hàng tu\u1ea7n s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi mail vào th\u1ee9 N\u0103m thay vì th\u1ee9 Sáu. Các kho\u1ea3n thanh toán l\u01b0\u01a1ng chuy\u1ec3n kho\u1ea3n tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp c\u0169ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u1eed lý s\u1edbm h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t ngày. Th\u1ee9 hai, phi\u1ebfu l\u01b0\u01a1ng cho các kho\u1ea3n thanh toán chuy\u1ec3n kho\u1ea3n tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp s\u1ebd không còn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c g\u1eedi qua mail n\u1eefa. Thay vào \u0111ó, nhân viên s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 xem thông tin này b\u1eb1ng cách truy c\u1eadp tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn vào tài kho\u1ea3n tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. Các quy trình khác s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c gi\u1eef nguyên. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các th\u1ebb th\u1eddi gian s\u1ebd ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao cho b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn tính l\u01b0\u01a1ng vào th\u1ee9 Hai lúc 6:00 CH. Các m\u1eabu th\u1ebb c\u0169 c\u0169ng s\u1ebd v\u1eabn có giá tr\u1ecb. Danh sách \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7, c\u1eadp nh\u1eadt các h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn v\u1ec1 th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c tr\u1ea3 l\u01b0\u01a1ng s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phân phát cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nhân viên vào ho\u1eb7c tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày 1 tháng 3. N\u1ebfu ai có b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó, vui lòng liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi Leonti Belousov theo s\u1ed1 máy l\u1ebb 5810.<\/p>"}

D. distributing (v-ing)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef A complete, updated list of instructions ch\u1ecbu tác \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u1ee7a hành \u0111\u1ed9ng distribute; m\u1eb7t khác, n\u1ed9i dung c\u1ee7a câu di\u1ec5n t\u1ea3 s\u1ef1 vi\u1ec7c x\u1ea3y ra trong t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai nên ta dùng b\u1ecb \u0111\u1ed9ng \u1edf thì t\u01b0\u01a1ng lai \u0111\u01a1n.<\/p>","en":"

__(4)__<\/p>

A. will distribute - used in the future simple<\/p>

B. will be distributed - passive voice in the future simple<\/p>

C. was distributed - passive voice in the past simple<\/p>

D. distributing (v-ing)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

The subject A complete, updated list of instructions receives the action of the verb distribute; otherwise, the sentence talks about the action in the future so we use passive voice in the future simple.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Tasty Treat in Kentron

Kentron's own Groovato Gelato was founded in 2010 when Luciano Algieri, an Italian immigrant to the United States, bought a __(1)__ on Coverby Avenue. The building had previously housed the Hopscotch Ice Cream Company, and Algieri was able to hire many former Hopscotch employees. Teaching __(2)__ ice-cream crafters to make gelato proved to be an easy task.

__(3)__ his product, Algieri started with an old family recipe. He then enhanced the flavor with secret ingredients plus unusual combinations of fruits and nuts. __(4)__ .

There are now three store locations in the Kentron area. Residents are lucky to have this gem!
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Món ngon \u1edf Kentron<\/p>

Groovato Gelato c\u1ee7a Kentron \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thành l\u1eadp vào n\u0103m 2010 khi Luciano Algieri, m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi Ý nh\u1eadp c\u01b0 \u0111\u1ebfn Hoa K\u1ef3, mua m\u1ed9t nhà máy trên \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Coverby. Tòa nhà tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây t\u1eebng là tr\u1ee5 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a Công ty Kem Hopscotch và Algieri có th\u1ec3 thuê nhi\u1ec1u nhân viên c\u0169 c\u1ee7a Hopscotch. D\u1ea1y nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi th\u1ee3 làm kem có kinh nghi\u1ec7m cách làm gelato \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ee9ng minh là m\u1ed9t nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 d\u1ec5 dàng.<\/p>

\u0110\u1ec3 làm nên s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mình, Algieri b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t công th\u1ee9c gia \u0111ình c\u0169. Sau \u0111ó, ông t\u0103ng c\u01b0\u1eddng h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb v\u1edbi các thành ph\u1ea7n bí m\u1eadt c\u1ed9ng v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p l\u1ea1 th\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a trái cây và các lo\u1ea1i h\u1ea1t. K\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 là m\u1ed9t h\u1ed7n h\u1ee3p h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb phong phú và th\u1ecfa mãn.<\/p>

Hi\u1ec7n có ba \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1eeda hàng \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c Kentron. C\u01b0 dân may m\u1eafn có \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c n\u01a1i \u0103n ngon nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf này.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Susan Rollins (10:12 SA)
Tôi v\u1eeba xem qua k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf s\u01a1 b\u1ed9 c\u1ee7a anh cho ngôi nhà c\u1ee7a Miller \u1edf \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Greenwood. M\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 trông r\u1ea5t tuy\u1ec7t, \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t là nhà b\u1ebfp và khu v\u1ef1c sinh ho\u1ea1t chính. M\u1ed1i b\u1eadn tâm duy nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a tôi là tính th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf c\u1ee7a phòng h\u1ee9ng n\u1eafng b\u1eb1ng kính. Phòng kính th\u01b0\u1eddng v\u01b0\u1ee3t quá ngân sách.
Myles Hart (10:15 SA)
Các khách hàng yêu c\u1ea7u tôi thêm c\u1ea3 phòng h\u1ee9ng n\u1eafng. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng tìm cách b\u1ecf thêm ti\u1ec1n cho phòng \u0111ó.
Susan Rollins (10:17 SA)
Chúng ta s\u1ebd c\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi hoàn thành các k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch này. Trong th\u1eddi gian ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i, anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t thi\u1ebft k\u1ebf m\u1edbi b\u1ecf qua ph\u1ea7n b\u1ed5 sung này không?
Myles Hart (10:18 SA)
Không thành v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1. Tôi s\u1ebd làm ngay bây gi\u1edd. Tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ecbnh nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi gia \u0111ình nhà Miller vào cu\u1ed1i ngày hôm nay, vì v\u1eady tôi có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 ngân sách v\u1edbi h\u1ecd lúc \u0111ó.<\/p>"}

{"vn":"

Lúc 10:18 SA, ông Hart có ý gì khi vi\u1ebft, “Không nên là m\u1ed9t v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1”?<\/p>

A. D\u1ef1 án phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi ngân sách.<\/p>

Myles Hart (10:18 A.M.): I'll work on it now.<\/p>"}

T\u1eeb: Maria Bayardi 8:45 CH. 555-0112
\u0110\u1ebfn: Steve Takiff
Chào Steve. Chuy\u1ebfn bay c\u1ee7a tôi \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y và chuy\u1ebfn bay m\u1edbi là sáng mai. Ông Zhen s\u1ebd tham quan c\u01a1 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a chúng ta vào sáng mai. Anh có th\u1ec3 d\u1eabn ông \u1ea5y tham quan không? Ông \u1ea5y mu\u1ed1n xem th\u1ee7 t\u1ee5c nh\u1eadp kho c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Ông \u1ea5y s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn lúc 0: 00 SA, và sau \u0111ó chúng ta \u0111ã lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch \u0103n tr\u01b0a cho ông \u1ea5y. questions.text_read:
Washington State to Introduce Its
Very Own Apple

By Julia Richards for The Agri Monthly

Scientists at Scales University reported last month that they have completed the development of the "Shiner Crisp," the first apple that Washington state farmers will have trademarked all to themselves. -[1]-. The first Shiner Crisp is expected to become available to consumers as early as next year. -[2]- .

Apple breeders design new apples especially to better compete with such traditional apple varieties as Reds and Juiceys. The development process involves a considerable investment of time and money in repeated taste tests for their new fruits. -[3]- . Whereas Reds and Juiceys average $1.29 per pound, new types of apples (such as the hugely popular Branburs and Honey-Sweets) are raking in at least three times as much.

These additions have major long-term impacts on the market, too. Two decades ago, Reds and Juiceys comprised over 50
percent of all apple sales; now their sales are less than 25 percent of the market. It is no wonder that apple breeders are racing to come up with the next popular apple! -[4]-.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Bang Washington gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u gi\u1ed1ng táo r\u1ea5t riêng c\u1ee7a mình
Vi\u1ebft b\u1edfi Julia Richards cho Nông nghi\u1ec7p h\u1eb1ng tháng
Các nhà khoa h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1i \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Scales \u0111ã tuyên b\u1ed1 vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd \u0111ã hoàn thành vi\u1ec7c phát tri\u1ec3n \"\"Shiner Crisp\"\", lo\u1ea1i táo \u0111\u1ea7u tiên mà nông dân bang Washington s\u1ebd \u0111\u0103ng ký nhãn hi\u1ec7u cho chính h\u1ecd. - [l] -. Gi\u1ed1ng Shiner Crisp \u0111\u1ea7u tiên d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd có m\u1eb7t trên th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng cho ng\u01b0\u1eddi tiêu dùng vào \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m sau. - [2] -.
Các nhà lai t\u1ea1o táo \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t t\u1ea1o ra nh\u1eefng lo\u1ea1i táo m\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 c\u1ea1nh tranh t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n v\u1edbi các gi\u1ed1ng táo truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 Reds và Juiceys. Quá trình phát tri\u1ec3n liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 \u0111áng k\u1ec3 v\u1ec1 th\u1eddi gian và ti\u1ec1n b\u1ea1c \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1eb7p \u0111i l\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i các th\u1eed nghi\u1ec7m h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb cho các gi\u1ed1ng trái cây c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd. - [3] -. Trong khi Reds và Juiceys có giá trung bình 1,29 \u0111ô la\/pound, các lo\u1ea1i táo m\u1edbi (ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 Brandow và Honey-Sweets c\u1ef1c k\u1ef3 ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn) có giá g\u1ea5p ít nh\u1ea5t ba l\u1ea7n.
Nh\u1eefng s\u1ef1 b\u1ed5 sung này c\u0169ng có tác \u0111\u1ed9ng l\u1edbn lâu dài \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Hai th\u1eadp k\u1ef7 tr\u01b0\u1edbc, Reds and Juiceys chi\u1ebfm h\u01a1n 50% t\u1ed5ng doanh s\u1ed1 bán táo; bây gi\u1edd doanh s\u1ed1 bán hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ít h\u01a1n 25% th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Không có gì l\u1ea1 khi các nhà lai t\u1ea1o táo \u0111ang \u0111ua nhau \u0111\u01b0a ra lo\u1ea1i táo ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn ti\u1ebfp theo! -[4]-.<\/p>"}

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Câu sau \u0111ây thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 v\u1ecb trí nào trong s\u1ed1 các v\u1ecb trí \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111ánh d\u1ea5u [1], [2], [3] và [4]? “Nói cách khác, nh\u1eefng gi\u1ed1ng táo m\u1edbi này \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ea1o ra \u0111\u1ec3 có h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb th\u01a1m ngon và l\u1ee3i nhu\u1eadn l\u1edbn.”<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

D\u1ef1a vào câu tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó:<\/p>

The development process involves a considerable investment of time and money in repeated taste tests for their new fruits.<\/p>","en":"

In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong? “In other words, these new types of apples are designed for big flavor and big profits.”<\/p>

A. [1]<\/p>

B. [2]<\/p>

C. [3]<\/p>

D. [4]<\/p>###

Based on the sentence right before:<\/p>

The development process involves a considerable investment of time and money in repeated taste tests for their new fruits.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Theresa Pearle (tpearle@praguequarterly.cz)
T\u1eeb: Marek Koubek (mkoubek@bistrokoubek.cz)
Tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi: Thông cáo báo chí
Ngày: 15 tháng 3
Bà Pearle thân m\u1ebfn,
Theo cu\u1ed9c g\u1ecdi \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a chúng tôi tr\u01b0\u1edbc ngày hôm nay, vui lòng xem thông cáo báo chí cho nhà hàng m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a tôi, Koubek, bên d\u01b0\u1edbi. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n bà m\u1ed9t l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb in nó trên t\u1ea1p chí c\u1ee7a bà. Th\u1eadt thú v\u1ecb khi nghe quan \u0111i\u1ec3m c\u1ee7a bà v\u1ec1 c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng nói ti\u1ebfng Anh \u0111ang phát tri\u1ec3n \u1edf Prague mà \u1ea5n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5. Chúng tôi hy v\u1ecdng nhà hàng s\u1ebd thu hút \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c công dân Séc c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 ng\u01b0\u1eddi M\u1ef9 và nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi n\u01b0\u1edbc ngoài khác c\u01b0 trú ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u1ebfn th\u0103m Praha.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Marek Koubek<\/p>

LIÊN H\u1ec6 NGAY L\u1eacP T\u1ee8C: KHAI TR\u01af\u01a0NG NHÀ HÀNG SÉC-M\u1ef8 BISTRO
PRAGUE (15 tháng 3) - Bistro Koubek, t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c t\u1ea1i V Celnici 437\/4, 110 00 Prague 1, s\u1ebd t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c l\u1ec5 khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng b\u1eb1ng m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c vào th\u1ee9 Sáu, ngày 21 tháng 5, b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u lúc 6:00 CH.
Theo ch\u1ee7 nhà hàng kiêm b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng Marek Koubek, nhà hàng s\u1ebd có cách n\u1ea5u n\u01b0\u1edbng k\u1ebft h\u1ee3p Cajun-Séc, cùng các món \u0103n ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn trong th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n t\u1eeb New Orleans, Louisiana, ch\u1eb3ng h\u1ea1n nh\u01b0 k\u1eb9o gumbo và jambalaya, v\u1edbi các món \u0103n truy\u1ec1n th\u1ed1ng c\u1ee7a Séc.
\u0110\u1ed3 u\u1ed1ng và \u0111\u1ed3 th\u1eed mi\u1ec5n phí s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 trong s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng, nh\u01b0ng các b\u1eefa \u0103n \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7 s\u1ebd không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5. Gi\u1edd ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng bình th\u01b0\u1eddng là 5:00 CH cho \u0111\u1ebfn n\u1eeda \u0111êm, b\u1ea3y ngày m\u1ed9t tu\u1ea7n, b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb ngày 22 tháng 5. Th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem t\u1ea1i www.bistrokoubek.cz.
\u0110\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp Koubek s\u1ed1ng \u1edf Prague cho \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m 16 tu\u1ed5i thì ông cùng gia \u0111ình chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn New Orleans, n\u01a1i cha ông m\u1edf m\u1ed9t nhà hàng. T\u1ea1i \u0111ây, ông làm vi\u1ec7c trong nhà b\u1ebfp khi theo h\u1ecdc t\u1ea1i H\u1ecdc vi\u1ec7n Ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt \u1ea8m th\u1ef1c Louisiana. Sau khi t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p, ông \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thuê làm b\u1ebfp tr\u01b0\u1edfng t\u1ea1i Nhà \u0103n thành ph\u1ed1 Crescent, n\u01a1i ông \u0111ã giành \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed1n gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng l\u1edbn cho th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111áo và s\u1ef1 tinh t\u1ebf trong cách trình bày b\u1eefa \u0103n. Ông r\u1ea5t xúc \u0111\u1ed9ng khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tr\u1edf v\u1ec1 ngôi nhà th\u1eddi th\u01a1 \u1ea5u c\u1ee7a mình và chia s\u1ebb di s\u1ea3n \u1ea9m th\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a hai n\u1ec1n v\u0103n hóa v\u1edbi th\u1ef1c khách c\u1ee7a thành ph\u1ed1.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why did Mr. Koubek e-mail Ms. Pearle?
childrens.answers: ["To invite her to a party","To provide content for an article","To announce the launch of a new Web site","To request her assistance in editing some text"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ông Koubek l\u1ea1i g\u1eedi email cho bà Pearle?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1ec3 m\u1eddi bà \u1ea5y \u0111\u1ebfn m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c<\/p>

B. \u0110\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p n\u1ed9i dung cho m\u1ed9t bài báo<\/p>

C. \u0110\u1ec3 thông báo v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c ra m\u1eaft m\u1ed9t trang web m\u1edbi<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ec3 yêu c\u1ea7u bà \u1ea5y h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 trong vi\u1ec7c ch\u1ec9nh s\u1eeda m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 v\u0103n b\u1ea3n<\/p>###

Per our phone call earlier today, please find the press release for my new restaurant, Koubek, below. <\/p>","en":"

Why did Mr. Koubek e-mail Ms. Pearle?<\/p>

A. To invite her to a party<\/p>

B. To provide content for an article<\/p>

C. To announce the launch of a new Web site<\/p>

D. To request her assistance in editing some text<\/p>###

Per our phone call earlier today, please find the press release for my new restaurant, Koubek, below. <\/p>"}

childrens.title: The phrase "appeal to" in paragraph 1, line 4, is closest in meaning to
childrens.answers: ["attract","join together","benefit","call upon"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

C\u1ee5m t\u1eeb “appeal to” g\u1ea7n ngh\u0129a nh\u1ea5t v\u1edbi<\/p>

A. attract: thu hút<\/p>

B. join together: g\u1eafn vào nhau<\/p>

C. benefit: t\u1ea1o ra l\u1ee3i ích <\/p>

D. call upon: yêu c\u1ea7u<\/p>","en":"

The phrase “appeal to” is closest in meaning to<\/p>

A. attract: pull or draw someone or something towards them, by the qualities they have<\/p>

B. join together: fix or connect two or more things together<\/p>

C. benefit:  be useful to somebody <\/p>

D. call upon: ask or demand that somebody do something<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the event on May 21?
childrens.answers: ["It will begin at 5:00P.M","Only a few people have been invited","All items will be served free of charge","Patrons must have a ticket to enter"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n vào ngày 21 tháng 5?<\/p>

A. Nó s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u lúc 5:00 CH.<\/p>

B. Ch\u1ec9 m\u1ed9t vài ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eddi.<\/p>

C. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ed3 s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 mi\u1ec5n phí.<\/p>

D. Khách hàng quen ph\u1ea3i có vé m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vào c\u1eeda.<\/p>###

[...] celebrate its grand opening with a party on Friday, 21 May. [...] Complimentary samples and beverages will be available during the grand opening event [...]<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about the event on May 21?<\/p>

A. It will begin at 5:00 P.M.<\/p>

B. Only a few people have been invited.<\/p>

C. All items will be served free of charge.<\/p>

D. Patrons must have a ticket to enter.<\/p>###

[...] celebrate its grand opening with a party on Friday, 21 May. [...] Complimentary samples and beverages will be available during the grand opening event [...]<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT stated about Mr. Koubek?
childrens.answers: ["He grew up in Prague","He has traveled extensively in Europe","He worked in his father's restaurant","He has won several cooking prizes"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì KHÔNG \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nêu v\u1ec1 ông Koubek?<\/p>

A. Ông \u1ea5y l\u1edbn lên \u1edf Praha.<\/p>

B. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ã \u0111i du l\u1ecbch nhi\u1ec1u n\u01a1i \u1edf châu Âu.<\/p>

C. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ã làm vi\u1ec7c trong nhà hàng c\u1ee7a b\u1ed1 ông \u1ea5y.<\/p>

D. Ông \u1ea5y \u0111ã giành \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 gi\u1ea3i th\u01b0\u1edfng n\u1ea5u \u0103n.<\/p>###

A - Chef Koubek lived in Prague until age sixteen [...]<\/p>

C - [...] where his father opened a restaurant. There, he worked in the kitchen [...]<\/p>

D - [...] he earned four major awards for his unique menus and flair for meal presentation.<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT stated about Mr. Koubek?<\/p>

A. He grew up in Prague.<\/p>

B. He has traveled extensively in Europe.<\/p>

C. He worked in his father's restaurant.<\/p>

D. He has won several cooking prizes.<\/p>###

A - Chef Koubek lived in Prague until age sixteen [...]<\/p>

C - [...] where his father opened a restaurant. There, he worked in the kitchen [...]<\/p>

D - [...] he earned four major awards for his unique menus and flair for meal presentation.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Peter Harrer [9:30 SA] Xin chào t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. Tôi s\u1ebd nói ng\u1eafn g\u1ecdn vì tôi bi\u1ebft t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n \u0111ang b\u1eadn \u0111\u1ecdc các b\u1ea3n th\u1ea3o cho cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp biên t\u1eadp vào th\u1ee9 Sáu.
Cora Grant [9:31 SA] Chúng ta có thay \u0111\u1ed5i th\u1eddi gian cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp không?
Peter Harrer [9:32 SA] V\u1eabn là lúc 2:00 ph\u1ea3i không?
Meili Shu [9:32 SA] Vâng. Lúc \u0111\u1ea7u chúng tôi nói cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp di\u1ec5n ra vào bu\u1ed5i sáng, nh\u01b0ng tôi có m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n lúc 10:00.
Peter Harrer [9:33 sáng] \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Tôi r\u1ea5t vui vì chúng ta \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. Tôi mu\u1ed1n chia s\u1ebb ý t\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a Kwang. Kwang, anh có mu\u1ed1n gi\u1ea3i thích v\u1ec1 ý t\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111ó không?
Kwang Chun [9:35 SA] Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. \u0110i\u1ec1u gì s\u1ebd x\u1ea3y ra n\u1ebfu chúng ta khuy\u1ebfn khích khách hàng c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u0103ng ký nh\u1eadn b\u1ea3n tin m\u1ed7i tháng qua e-mail? Chúng ta s\u1ebd có thông tin v\u1ec1 các ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình khuy\u1ebfn mãi \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t ho\u1eb7c các cu\u1ed9c thi t\u1eb7ng sách. Chúng ta th\u1eadm chí có th\u1ec3 yêu c\u1ea7u m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tác gi\u1ea3 vi\u1ebft các bài báo vào d\u1ecbp \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t.
Cora Grant [9:36 SA] Vâng, h\u1ecd có th\u1ec3 cung c\u1ea5p thông tin chi ti\u1ebft v\u1ec1 công vi\u1ec7c ho\u1eb7c có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed1n sách yêu thích.
Meili Shu [9:37 SA] \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t ý t\u01b0\u1edfng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi! Ngày nay, lo\u1ea1i hình này \u0111ang tr\u1edf nên ph\u1ed5 bi\u1ebfn h\u01a1n trong kinh doanh. Và m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi luôn thích có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i giành \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed1n sách mi\u1ec5n phí.
Peter Harrer [9:38 SA] Vâng, hãy nh\u1edb r\u1eb1ng chúng ta là m\u1ed9t t\u1edd báo nh\u1ecf v\u1edbi ngân sách nh\u1ecf. M\u1ed9t trong các b\u1ea1n có mu\u1ed1n b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u ý t\u01b0\u1edfng này không?
Kwang Chun [9:39 SA] Tôi cho r\u1eb1ng tôi nên làm, vì tôi \u0111ang \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t nó. Có l\u1ebd Meili s\u1ebd giúp ch\u1ee9?
Meili Shu [9:40 sáng] T\u1ea5t nhiên.
Peter Harrer [9:41 SA] \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. H\u1eb9n g\u1eb7p l\u1ea1i t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea1n vào th\u1ee9 Sáu.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Who most likely are the participants in the online chat discussion?
childrens.answers: ["Staff at a marketing firm","Reporters at a local newspaper","Presenters at a conference","Colleagues at a publishing company"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ai có nhi\u1ec1u kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng là nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham gia cu\u1ed9c th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn trò chuy\u1ec7n tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn?<\/p>

A. Nhân viên t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t công ty ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb<\/p>

B. Các phóng viên c\u1ee7a m\u1ed9t t\u1edd báo \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng<\/p>

C. Ng\u01b0\u1eddi thuy\u1ebft trình t\u1ea1i h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb<\/p>

D. \u0110\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t công ty xu\u1ea5t b\u1ea3n<\/p>###

I'll make this brief as I know you're all busy reading the manuscripts for the editorial meeting on Friday.<\/p>","en":"

Who most likely are the participants in the online chat discussion?<\/p>

A. Staff at a marketing firm<\/p>

B. Reporters at a local newspaper<\/p>

C. Presenters at a conference<\/p>

D. Colleagues at a publishing company<\/p>###

I'll make this brief as I know you're all busy reading the manuscripts for the editorial meeting on Friday.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 9:33A.M., what does Mr. Harrer mean when he writes, "we got that sorted out"?
childrens.answers: ["The manuscripts have all been assigned","A meeting time has been agreed upon","An appointment has been canceled","New work policies have been followed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Vào lúc 9:33 SA, ông Harrer có ý gì khi vi\u1ebft, “chúng tôi \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp xong”?<\/p>

A. T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các b\u1ea3n th\u1ea3o \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao.<\/p>

B. Th\u1eddi gian h\u1ecdp \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ed1ng nh\u1ea5t.<\/p>

C. M\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n \u0111ã b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y b\u1ecf.<\/p>

D. Các chính sách làm vi\u1ec7c m\u1edbi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c tuân th\u1ee7.<\/p>###

sort out: deal with somebody’s\/your own problems successfully<\/p>

Meili Shu [9:32 A.M.] Yes. At first we talked about having it in the morning, but I have an appointment at 10:00.<\/p>","en":"

At 9:33 A.M., what does Mr. Harrer mean when he writes, “we got that sorted out”?<\/p>

A. The manuscripts have all been assigned.<\/p>

B. A meeting time has been agreed upon.<\/p>

C. An appointment has been canceled.<\/p>

D. New work policies have been followed.<\/p>###

sort out: deal with somebody’s\/your own problems successfully<\/p>

Meili Shu [9:32 A.M.] Yes. At first we talked about having it in the morning, but I have an appointment at 10:00.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

B\u1ea3o hành b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng t\u1ea1i Công ty s\u0103m l\u1ed1p Haswell
T\u1ea1i Công ty s\u0103m l\u1ed1p Haswell, chúng tôi bi\u1ebft b\u1ea1n ph\u1ee5 thu\u1ed9c vào l\u1ed1p xe c\u1ee7a mình \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn n\u01a1i b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n. \u0110ó là lý do t\u1ea1i sao chúng tôi cung c\u1ea5p b\u1ea3o hành tr\u1ecdn \u0111\u1eddi v\u1ec1 b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng l\u1ed1p xe cho m\u1ed7i l\u1ed1p b\u1ea1n mua t\u1eeb chúng tôi. B\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng bao g\u1ed3m vi\u1ec7c ki\u1ec3m tra, xoay luân chuy\u1ec3n và s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa l\u1ed1p xe mi\u1ec5n phí.
Ki\u1ec3m tra: \u0110\u1ed9i ng\u0169 d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd ki\u1ec3m tra áp su\u1ea5t, b\u01a1m c\u0103ng l\u1ed1p xe n\u1ebfu c\u1ea7n và thông báo cho b\u1ea1n bi\u1ebft khi ta lông l\u1ed1p xe b\u1ecb mòn.
Xoay luân chuy\u1ec3n: \u0110i\u1ec1u quan tr\u1ecdng là ph\u1ea3i xoay l\u1ed1p xe c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n theo \u0111\u1ecbnh k\u1ef3. Nhóm c\u1ee7a chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 này cho b\u1ea1n trong vòng ch\u01b0a \u0111\u1ea7y n\u1eeda gi\u1edd.
S\u1eeda ch\u1eefa: N\u1ebfu l\u1ed1p xe c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n b\u1ecb x\u1eb9p, \u0111\u1ed9i ng\u0169 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd n\u1ed7 l\u1ef1c h\u1ebft s\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa h\u01b0 h\u1ecfng. N\u1ebfu l\u1ed1p xe không th\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c, chúng tôi s\u1ebd gi\u1ea3m giá cho b\u1ea1n 20% so v\u1edbi giá thông th\u01b0\u1eddng khi b\u1ea1n mua l\u1ed1p m\u1edbi.
Hãy mang xe c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n trong gi\u1edd làm vi\u1ec7c bình th\u01b0\u1eddng và nhân viên ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 thân thi\u1ec7n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi s\u1ebd giúp b\u1ea1n tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng nhanh chóng. Không c\u1ea7n cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n. Ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n xu\u1ea5t trình biên lai mua l\u1ed1p xe. B\u1ea3o hành này bao g\u1ed3m d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 b\u1ea3o hành tr\u1ecdn \u0111\u1eddi l\u1ed1p xe theo ng\u01b0\u1eddi mua ban \u0111\u1ea7u và không th\u1ec3 chuy\u1ec3n nh\u01b0\u1ee3ng cho các ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n ho\u1eb7c ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu khác.
S\u1ef1 hài lòng c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n là \u01b0u tiên hàng \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Không gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 các \u0111\u1ed1i th\u1ee7 c\u1ea1nh tranh, chúng tôi không ch\u1ec9 bán l\u1ed1p xe. Trong su\u1ed1t ba th\u1eadp k\u1ef7 là m\u1ed9t doanh nghi\u1ec7p thu\u1ed9c s\u1edf h\u1eefu gia \u0111ình t\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, chúng tôi \u0111ã phát tri\u1ec3n m\u1ed1i quan h\u1ec7 lâu dài v\u1edbi khách hàng b\u1eb1ng cách cung c\u1ea5p d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n b\u1ea1n \u0111ã mua hàng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Gaborone Times

20 May
Local Happenings

On 15 May, family members, friends, and colleagues of Dr. Patrick Matambo gathered at the Gaborone Star Hotel to celebrate his retirement, which will take effect on 1 June. For twenty years, Dr. Matambo has been the director of the Hawthorne Clinic, located near Hawthorne City University. Among the nearly 180 well-wishers in attendance were also some former patients who attested to the honoree's kindness and professionalism.

Dr. Matambo has also been a familiar face at local charity events, and in particular, he has helped to raise money for many area schools. His immediate plans are to take a month-long vacation on a cruise ship with his wife, Alicia Matambo.

Although Dr. Matambo is retiring, he will remain involved with the clinic as a consultant. A new director has been approved by the Hawthorne Clinic's board of trustees and is expected to be announced later this week.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Michael Kaelo (mkaelo@hawthorneclinic.bw)
T\u1eeb: Sophie Thabado (sthabado@Gaboronestar.bw)
Ngày: 20 tháng 2
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi: S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n
T\u1ec7p \u0111ính kèm: Tùy ch\u1ecdn th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i và b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a
Kính g\u1eedi ông Kaelo,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn Gaborone Star Hotel cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n. V\u1ec1 câu h\u1ecfi c\u1ee7a ông, chúng tôi có b\u1ed1n phòng khiêu v\u0169 có s\u1ee9c ch\u1ee9a l\u1edbn: Sao M\u1ed9c, Sao Th\u1ed5, Sao H\u1ea3i V\u01b0\u01a1ng và Sao Kim. S\u1ed1 ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i l\u1ea7n l\u01b0\u1ee3t dành cho 400, 300, 200 và 100 khách.
Tôi \u0111ã \u0111ính kèm m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tùy ch\u1ecdn th\u1ef1c \u0111\u01a1n b\u1eefa tr\u01b0a và b\u1eefa t\u1ed1i, nh\u01b0ng chúng tôi r\u1ea5t vui \u0111\u1ec3 làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi ông v\u1ec1 các yêu c\u1ea7u c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3. Chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp m\u1ed9t b\u1eefa \u0103n t\u1ea1i ch\u1ed7 ho\u1eb7c ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 theo ki\u1ec3u t\u1ef1 ch\u1ecdn. Chúng tôi c\u0169ng cung c\u1ea5p thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb nghe nhìn cho các bu\u1ed5i thuy\u1ebft trình ho\u1eb7c l\u1ec5 k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m c\u1ee7a doanh nghi\u1ec7p.
Vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu ông c\u1ea7n thêm b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 thông tin nào.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Sophie Thabado, Giám \u0111\u1ed1c s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n<\/p>

Th\u1eddi báo Gaborone
20 tháng 5
Các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng
Vào ngày 15 tháng 5, các thành viên gia \u0111ình, b\u1ea1n bè và \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a bác s\u0129 Patrick Matambo \u0111ã t\u1eadp trung t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n Gaborone Star \u0111\u1ec3 k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m ngày ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u c\u1ee7a ông, s\u1ebd có hi\u1ec7u l\u1ef1c vào ngày 1 tháng 6. Trong hai m\u01b0\u01a1i n\u0103m, Bác s\u0129 Matambo là giám \u0111\u1ed1c c\u1ee7a Phòng khám Hawthorne, g\u1ea7n \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Thành ph\u1ed1 Hawthorne. Trong s\u1ed1 g\u1ea7n 180 bác s\u0129 thông thái tham d\u1ef1 c\u0169ng có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u1ec7nh nhân c\u0169 \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lòng t\u1ed1t và s\u1ef1 chuyên nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c vinh danh.
Bác s\u0129 Matambo c\u0169ng là m\u1ed9t g\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1eb7t quen thu\u1ed9c t\u1ea1i các s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n t\u1eeb thi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng, và \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t, ông \u0111ã giúp quyên góp ti\u1ec1n cho nhi\u1ec1u tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ecdc trong khu v\u1ef1c. K\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch tr\u01b0\u1edbc m\u1eaft c\u1ee7a ông là \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 m\u1ed9t tháng trên tàu du l\u1ecbch v\u1edbi v\u1ee3, Alicia Matambo.
M\u1eb7c dù bác s\u0129 Matambo \u0111ã ngh\u1ec9 h\u01b0u, nh\u01b0ng ông s\u1ebd v\u1eabn tham gia v\u1edbi phòng khám v\u1edbi t\u01b0 cách là nhà t\u01b0 v\u1ea5n. M\u1ed9t giám \u0111\u1ed1c m\u1edbi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông qua b\u1edfi h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb c\u1ee7a Phòng khám Hawthorne và d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c công b\u1ed1 vào cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n này.\"<\/p>"}

Ngày: 3 tháng 5
\u0110ính kèm: L\u1ecbch trình tham quan
Kính g\u1eedi ông Reister:
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 các chuy\u1ebfn tham quan v\u1edbi Zhang Hong Kong Tours, Inc. C\u0169ng c\u1ea3m \u01a1n l\u1eddi khen c\u1ee7a ông - Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng \u0111\u1ed1i tác kinh doanh c\u1ee7a ông, ông Brown, \u0111ã hài lòng v\u1edbi chuy\u1ebfn tham quan Creative HK c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc và ông \u1ea5y \u0111ã gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi cho ông.
Chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 chuy\u1ebfn tham quan \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c lên l\u1ecbch trong chuy\u1ebfn th\u0103m ng\u1eafn ngày c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ebfn thành ph\u1ed1 c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trong tu\u1ea7n l\u1ec5 ngày 24 tháng 5. T\u1eeb e-mail c\u1ee7a ông, tôi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft ông thích tham quan các danh th\u1eafng l\u1ecbch s\u1eed. Chúng tôi có m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn mà tôi tin r\u1eb1ng ông s\u1ebd \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t thích thú. Nh\u01b0 ông có th\u1ec3 th\u1ea5y t\u1eeb l\u1ecbch trình \u0111ính kèm, m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng tour \u0111ó \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t h\u1ebft. Tôi khuyên ông nên \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 s\u1edbm n\u1ebfu ông mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o m\u1ed9t ch\u1ed7 trong chuy\u1ebfn tham quan khác. Tôi s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t vui khi \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 cho ông ngay sau khi ông xác nh\u1eadn. Tôi mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i t\u1eeb ông.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Florence Zhang,
Zhang Hong Kong Tours, Inc.\"<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\"http:\/\/www.aeolusovens.com\/commercial
Trang ch\u1ee7 | H\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn | D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 | \u0110ánh giá
Lò n\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u1ed1i l\u01b0u Aeolus Jetbake 3
Lò n\u01b0\u1edbng th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t cao này s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng không khí \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm nóng, tu\u1ea7n hoàn \u0111\u1ec3 làm chín th\u1ee9c \u0103n \u0111\u1ec1u và hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3.
\u0110\u1eb7c tr\u01b0ng:
• Tùy ch\u1ecdn ng\u01b0\u1eddi dùng có th\u1ec3 cài \u0111\u1eb7t linh ho\u1ea1t
• Bên trong lò r\u1ed9ng - sâu 104 cm
• 5 giá \u0111\u1ee1 và 11 v\u1ecb trí khác nhau
• Bánh xe có th\u1ec3 tháo r\u1eddi
• \u0110èn LED bên trong sáng
• Các ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9 qu\u1ea1t có th\u1ec3 l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Aldo Castro (aldoc@businessdining.com)
\u0110\u1ebfn: (customerervice@aeolusovens.com)
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: H\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9
Ngày: 1 tháng 5
G\u1eedi cho Nh\u1eefng ai quan tâm ,
Tôi mu\u1ed1n chia s\u1ebb m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i v\u1ec1 Aeolus Jetbake 3. Công ty chúng tôi \u0111i\u1ec1u hành d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 \u0103n u\u1ed1ng cho các doanh nghi\u1ec7p n\u1eb1m trong Khu ph\u1ee9c h\u1ee3p Red Umbrella \u1edf trung tâm thành ph\u1ed1 Austin. Chúng tôi \u0111ã mua Aeolus Jetbake 3 vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc. Lò n\u01b0\u1edbng này cho \u0111\u1ebfn nay là lò n\u01b0\u1edbng hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 nh\u1ea5t mà chúng tôi t\u1eebng g\u1eb7p, v\u1edbi công su\u1ea5t l\u1edbn và th\u1eddi gian n\u1ea5u n\u01b0\u1edbng nhanh chóng. \u0110i\u1ec1u này r\u1ea5t quan tr\u1ecdng, vì nhân viên c\u1ee7a tôi chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb b\u1eefa \u0103n cho m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng l\u1edbn ng\u01b0\u1eddi m\u1ed7i ngày. Ánh sáng tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi, vì v\u1eady chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 dàng nhìn th\u1ea5y \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111ang n\u1ea5u, ngay c\u1ea3 khi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ba giá tr\u1edf lên cùng m\u1ed9t lúc. Tuy nhiên, bánh s\u1eebng bò c\u1ee7a chúng tôi - m\u1ed9t món khoái kh\u1ea9u nh\u01b0ng khó ch\u1ebf bi\u1ebfn l\u1ea1i không thành công và \u0111\u1ea7u b\u1ebfp bánh ng\u1ecdt c\u1ee7a chúng tôi d\u01b0\u1eddng nh\u01b0 không th\u1ec3 tìm th\u1ea5y cài \u0111\u1eb7t nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9 phù h\u1ee3p. Ngoài ra, t\u1ea1i sao l\u1ea1i có các b\u1ed9 bánh xe? Chúng n\u1eb7ng, và chúng tôi không c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i di chuy\u1ec3n xung quanh nhà b\u1ebfp, nh\u01b0ng bánh xe s\u1ebd chi\u1ebfm không gian không c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft. Tôi không ch\u1eafc, n\u1ebfu có, chúng tôi có \u0111ang s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng sai cái gì hay không. Vui lòng cho tôi bi\u1ebft s\u1edbm nh\u1ea5t có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec3 chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 n\u01b0\u1edbng bánh hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n.
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i nhanh chóng,
Aldo Castro<\/p>

T\u1eeb: Iris Martz (imartz@aeolusovens.com)
T\u1edbi: Aldo Castro (aldoc@businessdining.com)
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Câu h\u1ecfi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n
Ngày: 5 tháng 5
Ông Castro thân m\u1ebfn,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã g\u1eedi e-mail g\u1ea7n \u0111ây v\u1ec1 Aeolus Jetbake 3. Tôi \u0111oán r\u1eb1ng v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 ông \u0111ang g\u1eb7p ph\u1ea3i liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn b\u1ea3ng \u0111i\u1ec1u khi\u1ec3n 1.0 là tiêu chu\u1ea9n trên h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các ki\u1ec3u máy c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Cái này có th\u1ec3 hoán \u0111\u1ed5i v\u1edbi b\u1ea3ng \u0111i\u1ec1u khi\u1ec3n 2.0, cho phép \u0111i\u1ec1u ch\u1ec9nh t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n và bao g\u1ed3m tính n\u0103ng \u0111\u1eb7t qu\u1ea1t luân chuy\u1ec3n nhi\u1ec7t \u1edf ba ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9 khác nhau. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi cho ông m\u1ed9t cái không tính phí. Vui lòng tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi kèm theo \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 giao hàng và s\u1ed1 sê-ri lò n\u01b0\u1edbng c\u1ee7a ông. Nó n\u1eb1m \u1edf m\u1eb7t sau, ngay d\u01b0\u1edbi gi\u1ea5y ch\u1ee9ng nh\u1eadn ki\u1ec3m tra xu\u1ea5t x\u01b0\u1edfng.
Cám \u01a1n \u0111ã mua hàng!
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Iris Martz
Ch\u0103m sóc khách hàng<\/p>"}
