childrens.title: What feature of the oven listed on the Web page is NOT referred to in Mr. Castro's e-mail?
childrens.answers: ["Ability to select fan modes","Spacious interior","Use of multiple racks","Bright internal LED lighting"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Tính n\u0103ng nào c\u1ee7a lò n\u01b0\u1edbng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê trên trang Web KHÔNG \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn trong e-mail c\u1ee7a ông Castro?<\/p>

A. Kh\u1ea3 n\u0103ng ch\u1ecdn ch\u1ebf \u0111\u1ed9 qu\u1ea1t<\/p>

B. Bên trong r\u1ed9ng rãi<\/p>

C. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng nhi\u1ec1u giá \u0111\u1ee1<\/p>

D. \u0110èn LED bên trong sáng<\/p>###

B - This oven is by far the most efficient oven we've encountered, with its large capacity and rapid cooking times.<\/p>

C, D - The lighting is great, so we can easily see what we're cooking, even with three or more racks in use at once. <\/p>","en":"

What feature of the oven listed on the Web page is NOT referred to in Mr. Castro's e-mail?<\/p>

A. Ability to select fan modes<\/p>

B. Spacious interior<\/p>

C. Use of multiple racks<\/p>

D. Bright internal LED lighting<\/p>###

B - This oven is by far the most efficient oven we've encountered, with its large capacity and rapid cooking times.<\/p>

C, D - The lighting is great, so we can easily see what we're cooking, even with three or more racks in use at once. <\/p>"}

\u0110\u1ebfn: jacknajarian@sellomail.com
T\u1eeb: guestervices@pamakanihotel.com
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Bài h\u1ecdc l\u01b0\u1edbt sóng
Ngày: 10 tháng 5
Kính g\u1eedi ông Najarian,
C\u1ea3m \u01a1n ông \u0111ã vi\u1ebft th\u01b0 cho chúng tôi t\u1ea1i khách s\u1ea1n Pamakani \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi chúng tôi có th\u1ec3 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u m\u1ed9t tr\u01b0\u1eddng d\u1ea1y l\u01b0\u1edbt sóng g\u1ea7n \u0111ó hay không. Ông s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t vui khi bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng Tr\u01b0\u1eddng L\u01b0\u1edbt sóng Lauloa (www.lauloasurfschool.com) n\u1eb1m trên bãi bi\u1ec3n ch\u1ec9 cách khách s\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a chúng tôi vài b\u01b0\u1edbc chân. Giá c\u1ea3 h\u1ee3p lý, và bài h\u1ecdc c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd là khá hay. Sau 4 gi\u1edd h\u1ecdc v\u1edbi huy\u1ec1n tho\u1ea1i Alana Kapaku, cá nhân tôi có th\u1ec3 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u h\u1ecd cho ông.
Chúng tôi mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c chào \u0111ón ông và con gái c\u1ee7a ông khi ông \u0111\u1ebfn vào ngày 4 tháng 6. Vui lòng cho chúng tôi bi\u1ebft n\u1ebfu ông có thêm b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi ho\u1eb7c nhu c\u1ea7u nào tr\u01b0\u1edbc ho\u1eb7c trong th\u1eddi gian l\u01b0u trú. Chúng tôi s\u1eb5n sàng ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Regina Manibog
\u0110\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n, D\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 khách, Khách s\u1ea1n Pamakani<\/p>

\u0110\u1ed1i v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các c\u1ea5p, c\u01a1 b\u1ea3n cho \u0111\u1ebfn nâng cao. L\u1edbp h\u1ecdc chuyên nghi\u1ec7p
Dành cho nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi l\u01b0\u1edbt sóng nâng cao. Alana \u0111ã thi \u0111\u1ea5u chuyên nghi\u1ec7p h\u01a1n 10 n\u0103m. H\u1ecdc sinh c\u1ee7a cô có c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng ngôi sao \u0111i\u1ec7n \u1ea3nh n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng!

questions.text_read:
Pop Superstar Coming Home

LAFONT (May 23)-Sonia Benitez is coming back to where it all started, and she's giving back. The international pop superstar announced that she has added a free concert in Lafont to her Long Road tour, which begins on June 2. Benitez will perform in Lafont on July 17.

Born in nearby Ollender, Benitez moved to Lafont with her family when she was five years old. She graduated from Jasper High School, where she first caught the attention of peers and teachers by winning the school-wide talent show at the age of fourteen, the first time she ever set foot on a stage. Since then, she has embarked on a professional career that has taken her to five continents and has won her millions of fans all over the world.

Benitez made the decision to add a concert in Lafont when her manager, Jeremy Hampton, brought to her attention a three-day break after a show in Chicago. "It was obvious to both of us," Benitez said in a phone call from her recording studio in Los Angeles. "To be so close to Lafont with an extra three days and not do a show would be unthinkable. It was a very easy decision to make."

The only challenge was finding a venue that would accommodate all of Benitez' hometown fans. The town's largest theater seats only 1,200. Lafont Mayor Ellis Swanson came up with a creative solution. "He suggested an outdoor concert," said Benitez. "Not at a stadium, but at a local farm outside of town. That way there won't be a limit on how many people can attend. We'll just set up a stage in the middle of a huge field.

"Local radio DJ Taylor Wendel estimates that as many as 8,000 fans might turn out for the concert.

"Considering how popular Sonia is around here, and considering the concert is free, I think that's a conservative estimate," says Wendel. "It's going to be a memorable event."

Benitez Plays to Big Crowd

LAFONT (July 18)-Sonia Benitez' homecoming concert last night in a field at Gingham Hills Farm was nothing short of phenomenal. The crowd of 10,000-plus was delighted to welcome the hometown hero, who was making her first trip back to Lafont in more than 12 years. Benitez put on quite a show, extending her usual two-hour set of songs by another hour with an additional eight songs.

The evening's most memorable moment (of which there were many) came when Benitez was joined onstage by pianist Genevieve Parker, another native of Lafont and friend of Sonia's since the age of six. While perhaps not as well known as Benitez, Parker is an equally accomplished musician, having studied classical piano in Vienna and having toured internationally with the Vienna Touring Orchestra.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Siêu sao nh\u1ea1c tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i quê nhà
LAFONT (23 tháng 5) - Sonia Benitez s\u1ebd tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i n\u01a1i m\u1ecdi th\u1ee9 b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u, và cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd tri ân. Siêu sao nh\u1ea1c pop qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf thông báo r\u1eb1ng cô \u0111ã thêm m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c mi\u1ec5n phí \u1edf Lafont vào chuy\u1ebfn l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n Long Road c\u1ee7a mình, b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u vào ngày 2 tháng 6. Benitez s\u1ebd bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n \u1edf Lafont vào ngày 17 tháng 7.
Sinh ra \u1edf Ollender g\u1ea7n \u0111ó, Benitez chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn Lafont cùng gia \u0111ình khi cô m\u1edbi 5 tu\u1ed5i. Cô t\u1ed1t nghi\u1ec7p tr\u01b0\u1eddng trung h\u1ecdc Jasper, n\u01a1i cô l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên thu hút s\u1ef1 chú ý c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n và giáo viên khi giành chi\u1ebfn th\u1eafng trong cu\u1ed9c thi tài n\u0103ng toàn tr\u01b0\u1eddng vào n\u0103m m\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ed1n tu\u1ed5i, l\u1ea7n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên cô \u0111\u1eb7t chân lên sân kh\u1ea5u. K\u1ec3 t\u1eeb \u0111ó, cô b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u s\u1ef1 nghi\u1ec7p chuyên nghi\u1ec7p \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0a cô \u0111\u1ebfn n\u0103m châu l\u1ee5c và thu hút \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hàng tri\u1ec7u ng\u01b0\u1eddi hâm m\u1ed9 trên toàn th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi.
Benitez \u0111\u01b0a ra quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c thêm m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c \u1edf Lafont khi ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a cô, Jeremy Hampton, nói v\u1edbi cô v\u1ec1 th\u1eddi gian ngh\u1ec9 ba ngày sau bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n \u1edf Chicago. "\u0110ó là \u0111i\u1ec1u hi\u1ec3n nhiên \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi c\u1ea3 hai chúng tôi", Benitez nói trong m\u1ed9t cu\u1ed9c \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i t\u1eeb phòng thu âm c\u1ee7a cô \u1edf Los Angeles. "\u0110\u1ec3 \u1edf g\u1ea7n Lafont thêm ba ngày và không t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n nào là \u0111i\u1ec1u không t\u01b0\u1edfng. \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh r\u1ea5t d\u1ec5 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n."
Thách th\u1ee9c duy nh\u1ea5t là tìm m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m có s\u1ee9c ch\u1ee9a t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi hâm m\u1ed9 \u1edf quê nhà c\u1ee7a Benitez. Nhà hát l\u1edbn nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n ch\u1ec9 có 1.200 ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i. Th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1edfng Lafont, Ellis Swanson \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0a ra m\u1ed9t gi\u1ea3i pháp sáng t\u1ea1o. "Ông \u1ea5y \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c ngoài tr\u1eddi," Benitez nói. "Không ph\u1ea3i \u1edf sân v\u1eadn \u0111\u1ed9ng, mà là \u1edf m\u1ed9t trang tr\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng bên ngoài th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n. B\u1eb1ng cách \u0111ó, s\u1ebd không có gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ng\u01b0\u1eddi có th\u1ec3 tham d\u1ef1. Chúng tôi s\u1ebd ch\u1ec9 d\u1ef1ng m\u1ed9t sân kh\u1ea5u \u1edf gi\u1eefa m\u1ed9t cánh \u0111\u1ed3ng r\u1ed9ng l\u1edbn."
DJ c\u1ee7a \u0111ài phát thanh \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng Taylor Wendel \u01b0\u1edbc tính có kho\u1ea3ng 8.000 ng\u01b0\u1eddi hâm m\u1ed9 có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn xem bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c.
Wendel nói: “Xem xét m\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ed9 n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a Sonia \u1edf \u0111ây và bi\u1ebft bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c mi\u1ec5n phí, tôi ngh\u0129 nên \u01b0\u1edbc tính th\u1eadn tr\u1ecdng,” Wendel nói. "\u0110ó s\u1ebd là m\u1ed9t s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n \u0111áng nh\u1edb."<\/p>

Benitez trình di\u1ec5n tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ám \u0111ông khán gi\u1ea3
LAFONT (18 tháng 7) Bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i quê h\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a Sonia Benitez \u0111êm qua t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t cánh \u0111\u1ed3ng \u1edf trang tr\u1ea1i Gingham Hills th\u1eadt phi th\u01b0\u1eddng. H\u01a1n 10.000 ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã vui m\u1eebng chào \u0111ón ng\u01b0\u1eddi hùng quê h\u01b0\u01a1ng, ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i \u0111\u1ea7u tiên tr\u1edf l\u1ea1i Lafont sau h\u01a1n 12 n\u0103m. Benitez \u0111ã th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n khá t\u1ed1t, kéo dài hai gi\u1edd t\u1eadp h\u1ee3p các bài hát thông th\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a mình thêm m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd v\u1edbi thêm tám bài hát.
Kho\u1ea3nh kh\u1eafc \u0111áng nh\u1edb nh\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i (trong s\u1ed1 \u0111ó có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u) \u0111\u1ebfn khi Benitez bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n trên sân kh\u1ea5u v\u1edbi ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 d\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea7m Genevieve Parker, m\u1ed9t ngh\u1ec7 s\u0129 khác quê \u1edf Lafont và là b\u1ea1n c\u1ee7a Sonia t\u1eeb n\u0103m 6 tu\u1ed5i. M\u1eb7c dù có l\u1ebd không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u nh\u01b0 Benitez nh\u01b0ng Parker là m\u1ed9t nh\u1ea1c s\u0129 có thành tích không kém, t\u1eebng h\u1ecdc d\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea7m c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n \u1edf Vienna và \u0111ã có chuy\u1ebfn l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf v\u1edbi Dàn nh\u1ea1c l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n c\u1ee7a Viên.<\/p>

Sonia Benitez \u1edf Lafont
Ghi chú \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t
Trang tr\u1ea1i Gingham Hills t\u1ef1 hào t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c quê h\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a Sonia Benitez. Trong s\u1ed1 các bài hát mà Sonia s\u1ebd bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n t\u1ed1i nay có nh\u1eefng bài \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c li\u1ec7t kê d\u01b0\u1edbi \u0111ây, có ý ngh\u0129a \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi Sonia và c\u1ed9ng \u0111\u1ed3ng Lafont.
"Bài ca b\u01b0\u01a1m b\u01b0\u1edbm": Sáng tác \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a Sonia, vi\u1ebft chung v\u1edbi ch\u1ecb gái khi cô \u1ea5y 11 tu\u1ed5i
"B\u1eefa t\u1ed1i bên b\u1edd sông": M\u1ed9t bài hát v\u1ec1 sông Walton, ch\u1ea3y qua Lafont, v\u1edbi hát bè c\u1ee7a Dàn h\u1ee3p x\u01b0\u1edbng tr\u01b0\u1eddng trung h\u1ecdc Jasper
"M\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i sáng": \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c Sonia hát trong bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y \u1edf tr\u01b0\u1eddng trung h\u1ecdc
"M\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi cùng m\u1ec9m c\u01b0\u1eddi": Sonia s\u1ebd bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n cùng m\u1ed9t ng\u01b0\u1eddi b\u1ea1n th\u1eddi th\u01a1 \u1ea5u ch\u01a1i d\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ea7m<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is indicated about the song "A Single Morning"?
childrens.answers: ["It is about life in Lafont","It is usually performed with a choir","It was Ms. Benitez' first song played on the radio","It was sung by Ms. Benitez at a talent show"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch\u1ec9 ra v\u1ec1 bài hát “Bu\u1ed5i sáng m\u1ed9t mình”?<\/p>

A. Nó nói v\u1ec1 cu\u1ed9c s\u1ed1ng \u1edf Lafont.<\/p>

B. Nó th\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t dàn h\u1ee3p x\u01b0\u1edbng.<\/p>

C. \u0110ây là bài hát \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a cô Benitez \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c phát trên \u0111ài.<\/p>

D. Nó \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c cô Benitez hát t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n tài n\u0103ng.<\/p>###

- She graduated from Jasper High School, where she first caught the attention of peers and teachers by winning the school­ wide talent show at the age of fourteen, the first time she ever set foot on a stage.<\/p>

- “A Single Morning”: Sung by Sonia at her first-ever performance during high school<\/p>","en":"

What is indicated about the song “A Single Morning”?<\/p>

A. It is about life in Lafont.<\/p>

B. It is usually performed with a choir.<\/p>

C. It was Ms. Benitez' first song played on the radio.<\/p>

D. It was sung by Ms. Benitez at a talent show.<\/p>###

- She graduated from Jasper High School, where she first caught the attention of peers and teachers by winning the school­ wide talent show at the age of fourteen, the first time she ever set foot on a stage.<\/p>

- “A Single Morning”: Sung by Sonia at her first-ever performance during high school<\/p>"}

childrens.title: How did the concert in Lafont differ from Ms. Benitez' usual concerts?
childrens.answers: ["It was an hour longer","It was held in the daytime","Attendees were seated in a stadium","The Vienna Touring Orchestra opened the show"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c \u1edf Lafont khác v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng bu\u1ed5i hòa nh\u1ea1c thông th\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a cô Benitez nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

A. Nó kéo dài h\u01a1n m\u1ed9t gi\u1edd.<\/p>

B. Nó \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c vào ban ngày.<\/p>

C. Nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi tham d\u1ef1 \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp ch\u1ed7 ng\u1ed3i trong m\u1ed9t sân v\u1eadn \u0111\u1ed9ng.<\/p>

D. Dàn nh\u1ea1c l\u01b0u di\u1ec5n Viên m\u1edf màn bu\u1ed5i bi\u1ec3u di\u1ec5n.<\/p>###

Benitez put on quite a show, extending her usual two-hour set of songs by another hour with an additional eight songs.<\/p>","en":"

How did the concert in Lafont differ from Ms. Benitez' usual concerts?<\/p>

A. It was an hour longer.<\/p>

B. It was held in the daytime.<\/p>

C. Attendees were seated in a stadium.<\/p>

D. The Vienna Touring Orchestra opened the show.<\/p>###

Benitez put on quite a show, extending her usual two-hour set of songs by another hour with an additional eight songs.<\/p>"}
